2334  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
2335  }
2336 
2337  if (QUADRA)
2338  {
2339  height_aligned = ((video_height + 1) / 2) * 2;
2340  } else
2341  {
2342  // TBD height has to be 8-aligned; had a checking at codec opening, but
2343  // if still getting non-8-aligned here, that could only be the case of
2344  // resolution change mid-stream: device_handle it by making them 8-aligned
2345  height_aligned = ((video_height + 7) / 8) * 8;
2346 
2347  if (alignment)
2348  {
2349  height_aligned = ((video_height + 15) / 16) * 16;
2350  }
2351  }
2352  if (height_aligned < NI_MIN_HEIGHT)
2353  {
2354  height_aligned = NI_MIN_HEIGHT;
2355  }
2356 
2357  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2358  "%s: aligned=%dx%d org=%dx%d linesize=%d/%d/%d "
2359  "extra_len=%d\n",
2360  __func__, video_width, height_aligned, video_width, video_height,
2361  linesize[0], linesize[1], linesize[2], extra_len);
2362 
2363  int luma_size = linesize[0] * height_aligned;
2364  int chroma_b_size;
2365  int chroma_r_size;
2366  if (QUADRA)
2367  {
2368  chroma_b_size = chroma_r_size = linesize[1] * (height_aligned / 2);
2369  if (alignment_2pass_wa)
2370  {
2371  // for 2-pass encode output mismatch WA, need to extend (and pad) Cr plane height, because 1st pass assume input 32 align
2372  chroma_r_size = linesize[1] * (((height_aligned + 31) / 32) * 32) / 2;
2373  }
2374  //ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: luma_size=%d chroma_b_size=%d chroma_r_size=%d\n", __func__, luma_size, chroma_b_size, chroma_r_size);
2375  }
2376  else
2377  {
2378  chroma_b_size = luma_size / 4;
2379  chroma_r_size = luma_size / 4;
2380  }
2381  if(extra_len >= 0)
2382  {
2383  int buffer_size = luma_size + chroma_b_size + chroma_r_size + extra_len;
2384 
2385  buffer_size = ((buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
2386 
2387  //Check if Need to free
2388  if ((p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size) && (p_frame->buffer_size > 0))
2389  {
2390  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2391  "%s: free current p_frame, "
2392  "p_frame->buffer_size=%u\n",
2393  __func__, p_frame->buffer_size);
2394  ni_frame_buffer_free(p_frame);
2395  }
2396 
2397  //Check if need to realocate
2398  if (p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size)
2399  {
2400  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
2401  {
2402  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate p_frame buffer.\n",
2403  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
2404  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
2405  LRETURN;
2406  }
2407 
2408  // init once after allocation
2409  memset(p_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
2410  p_frame->buffer_size = buffer_size;
2411  p_frame->p_buffer = p_buffer;
2412 
2413  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: allocated new p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
2414  }
2415  else
2416  {
2417  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: reuse p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
2418  }
2419  p_frame->p_data[0] = (uint8_t*)p_frame->p_buffer;
2420  p_frame->p_data[1] = (uint8_t*)p_frame->p_data[0] + luma_size;
2421  p_frame->p_data[2] = (uint8_t*)p_frame->p_data[1] + chroma_b_size;
2422  }
2423  else
2424  {
2425  p_frame->buffer_size = 0; //no ownership
2426  }
2427 
2428  p_frame->data_len[0] = luma_size;
2429  p_frame->data_len[1] = chroma_b_size;
2430  p_frame->data_len[2] = chroma_r_size;
2431  p_frame->data_len[3] = 0;//unused by hwdesc
2432 
2433  p_frame->video_width = video_width;
2434  p_frame->video_height = height_aligned;
2435 
2436  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2437  "%s: success: p_frame->p_buffer %p "
2438  "p_frame->buffer_size=%u\n",
2439  __func__, p_frame->p_buffer, p_frame->buffer_size);
2440 
2441 END:
2442 
2443  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
2444  {
2445  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
2446  }
2447 
2448  return retval;
2449 }
2450 
2451 /*!*****************************************************************************
2452  * \brief allocate device destination frame from scaler hwframe pool
2453  *
2454  * \param
2455  *
2456  * \return 0 if successful, < 0 otherwise
2457  ******************************************************************************/
2458 ni_retcode_t ni_scaler_dest_frame_alloc(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
2459  ni_scaler_input_params_t scaler_params,
2460  niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface)
2461 {
2462  int ret = 0;
2463  if (scaler_params.op != NI_SCALER_OPCODE_OVERLAY)
2464  {
2465  ret = ni_device_alloc_frame(
2466  p_ctx, scaler_params.output_width, scaler_params.output_height,
2467  scaler_params.output_format, NI_SCALER_FLAG_IO,
2468  scaler_params.out_rec_width, scaler_params.out_rec_height,
2469  scaler_params.out_rec_x, scaler_params.out_rec_y,
2470  scaler_params.rgba_color, -1, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
2471  } else
2472  {
2473  // in vf_overlay_ni.c: flags = (s->alpha_format ? NI_SCALER_FLAG_PA : 0) | NI_SCALER_FLAG_IO;
2474  ret = ni_device_alloc_frame(
2475  p_ctx, scaler_params.output_width, scaler_params.output_height,
2476  scaler_params.output_format, NI_SCALER_FLAG_IO,
2477  scaler_params.out_rec_width, scaler_params.out_rec_height,
2478  scaler_params.out_rec_x, scaler_params.out_rec_y,
2479  p_surface->ui32nodeAddress, p_surface->ui16FrameIdx,
2480  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
2481  }
2482  return ret;
2483 }
2484 
2485 /*!*****************************************************************************
2486  * \brief allocate device input frame by hw descriptor. This call won't actually allocate
2487  a frame but sends the incoming hardware frame index to the scaler manager
2488  *
2489  * \param
2490  *
2491  * \return 0 if successful, < 0 otherwise
2492  ******************************************************************************/
2493 ni_retcode_t ni_scaler_input_frame_alloc(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
2494  ni_scaler_input_params_t scaler_params,
2495  niFrameSurface1_t *p_src_surface)
2496 {
2497  int ret = 0;
2498 
2499  ret = ni_device_alloc_frame(
2500  p_ctx, scaler_params.input_width, scaler_params.input_height,
2501  scaler_params.input_format, 0, scaler_params.in_rec_width,
2502  scaler_params.in_rec_height, scaler_params.in_rec_x,
2503  scaler_params.in_rec_y, p_src_surface->ui32nodeAddress,
2504  p_src_surface->ui16FrameIdx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
2505  return ret;
2506 }
2507 
2508 /*!*****************************************************************************
2509  * \brief init output pool of scaler frames
2510  *
2511  * \param
2512  *
2513  * \return 0 if successful, < 0 otherwise
2514  ******************************************************************************/
2515 ni_retcode_t ni_scaler_frame_pool_alloc(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
2516  ni_scaler_input_params_t scaler_params)
2517 {
2518  int pool_size = 1; // set to 1 for this demo
2519 
2520  int rc = 0;
2521  int options = NI_SCALER_FLAG_IO | NI_SCALER_FLAG_PC;
2522  if (p_ctx->isP2P)
2523  options |= NI_SCALER_FLAG_P2;
2524 
2525  /* Allocate a pool of frames by the scaler */
2526  rc = ni_device_alloc_frame(p_ctx, scaler_params.output_width,
2527  scaler_params.output_height,
2528  scaler_params.output_format, options,
2529  0, // rec width
2530  0, // rec height
2531  0, // rec X pos
2532  0, // rec Y pos
2533  pool_size, // rgba color/pool size
2534  0, // frame index
2535  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
2536  return rc;
2537 }
2538 
2539 /*!*****************************************************************************
2540 * \brief Allocate memory for the frame buffer based on provided parameters
2541 * taking into account pic line size and extra data.
2542 * Applicable to nv12 AVFrame only. Cb/Cr size matches that of Y.
2543 *
2544 * \param[in] p_frame Pointer to a caller allocated ni_frame_t struct
2545 *
2546 * \param[in] video_width Width of the video frame
2547 * \param[in] video_height Height of the video frame
2548 * \param[in] linesize Picture line size
2549 * \param[in] extra_len Extra data size (incl. meta data). < 0 means not
2550 * to allocate any buffer (zero-copy from existing)
2551 * \param[in] alignment_2pass_wa set alignment to work with 2pass encode
2552 *
2553 * \return On success
2554 * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
2555 * On failure
2556 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
2557 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
2558 *****************************************************************************/
2559 ni_retcode_t ni_frame_buffer_alloc_nv(ni_frame_t *p_frame, int video_width,
2560  int video_height, int linesize[],
2561  int extra_len, bool alignment_2pass_wa)
2562 {
2563  void* p_buffer = NULL;
2564  int height_aligned;
2565  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
2566 
2567  if ((!p_frame) || (!linesize) || (linesize[0] <= 0) || (linesize[0]>NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_LINESIZE)
2568  || (video_width>NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_WIDTH) || (video_width <= 0)
2569  || (video_height>NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT) || (video_height <= 0))
2570  {
2571  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s passed parameters are null or not supported, "
2572  "p_frame %p, linesize %p, video_width %d, video_height %d\n",
2573  __func__, p_frame, linesize, video_width, video_height);
2574  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
2575  }
2576 
2577  height_aligned = ((video_height + 1) / 2) * 2;
2578 
2579  if (height_aligned < NI_MIN_HEIGHT)
2580  {
2581  height_aligned = NI_MIN_HEIGHT;
2582  }
2583 
2584  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2585  "%s: aligned=%dx%d org=%dx%d linesize=%d/%d/%d extra_len=%d\n",
2586  __func__, video_width, height_aligned, video_width, video_height,
2587  linesize[0], linesize[1], linesize[2], extra_len);
2588 
2589  int luma_size = linesize[0] * height_aligned;
2590  int chroma_br_size = luma_size / 2;
2591  //int chroma_r_size = luma_size / 4;
2592  if (alignment_2pass_wa)
2593  {
2594  // for 2-pass encode output mismatch WA, need to extend (and pad) CbCr plane height, because 1st pass assume input 32 align
2595  chroma_br_size = linesize[0] * ((((height_aligned + 31) / 32) * 32) / 2);
2596  }
2597  if (extra_len >= 0)
2598  {
2599  int buffer_size = luma_size + chroma_br_size + extra_len;
2600 
2601  buffer_size = ((buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
2602 
2603  //Check if Need to free
2604  if ((p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size) && (p_frame->buffer_size > 0))
2605  {
2606  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: free current p_frame->buffer_size=%u\n",
2607  __func__, p_frame->buffer_size);
2608  ni_frame_buffer_free(p_frame);
2609  }
2610 
2611  //Check if need to realocate
2612  if (p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size)
2613  {
2614  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
2615  {
2616  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate p_frame buffer.\n",
2617  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
2618  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
2619  LRETURN;
2620  }
2621 
2622  // init once after allocation
2623  memset(p_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
2624  p_frame->buffer_size = buffer_size;
2625  p_frame->p_buffer = p_buffer;
2626 
2627  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: allocated new p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
2628  }
2629  else
2630  {
2631  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: reuse p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
2632  }
2633 
2634  p_frame->p_data[0] = (uint8_t*)p_frame->p_buffer;
2635  p_frame->p_data[1] = (uint8_t*)p_frame->p_data[0] + luma_size;
2636  p_frame->p_data[2] = (uint8_t*)p_frame->p_data[1] + chroma_br_size;
2637  }
2638  else
2639  {
2640  p_frame->buffer_size = 0; //no ownership
2641  }
2642  p_frame->data_len[0] = luma_size;
2643  p_frame->data_len[1] = chroma_br_size;
2644  p_frame->data_len[2] = 0;
2645 
2646  p_frame->video_width = video_width;
2647  p_frame->video_height = height_aligned;
2648 
2649  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: success: p_frame->buffer_size=%u\n", __func__,
2650  p_frame->buffer_size);
2651 
2652 END:
2653 
2654  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
2655  {
2656  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
2657  }
2658 
2659  return retval;
2660 }
2661 
2662 /*!*****************************************************************************
2663  * \brief This API is a wrapper for ni_encoder_frame_buffer_alloc(), used
2664  * for planar pixel formats, and ni_frame_buffer_alloc_nv(), used for
2665  * semi-planar pixel formats. This API is meant to combine the
2666  * functionality for both individual format APIs.
2667  * Allocate memory for the frame buffer for encoding based on given
2668  * parameters, taking into account pic line size and extra data.
2669  * Applicable to YUV420p(8 or 10 bit/pixel) or nv12 AVFrame.
2670  * Cb/Cr size matches that of Y.
2671  *
2672  * \param[in] planar true: if planar:
2673  * pixel_format == (NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P ||
2674  * NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE ||NI_PIX_FMT_RGBA).
2675  * false: semi-planar:
2676  * pixel_format == (NI_PIX_FMT_NV12 ||
2677  * NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE).
2678  * \param[in] p_frame Pointer to a caller allocated ni_frame_t struct
2679  * \param[in] video_width Width of the video frame
2680  * \param[in] video_height Height of the video frame
2681  * \param[in] linesize Picture line size
2682  * \param[in] alignment Allignment requirement. Only used for planar format.
2683  * \param[in] extra_len Extra data size (incl. meta data). < 0 means not
2684  * to allocate any buffer (zero-copy from existing)
2685  * \param[in] alignment_2pass_wa set alignment to work with 2pass encode
2686  *
2687  * \return On success
2688  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
2689  * On failure
2690  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
2691  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
2692  *****************************************************************************/
2693 ni_retcode_t ni_encoder_sw_frame_buffer_alloc(bool planar, ni_frame_t *p_frame,
2694  int video_width, int video_height,
2695  int linesize[], int alignment,
2696  int extra_len,
2697  bool alignment_2pass_wa)
2698 {
2699  if (true == planar)
2700  {
2701  return ni_encoder_frame_buffer_alloc(p_frame, video_width, video_height,
2702  linesize, alignment, extra_len,
2703  alignment_2pass_wa);
2704  }
2705  else
2706  {
2707  return ni_frame_buffer_alloc_nv(p_frame, video_width, video_height,
2708  linesize, extra_len,
2709  alignment_2pass_wa);
2710  }
2711 }
2712 
2713 /*!*****************************************************************************
2714  * \brief Free frame buffer that was previously allocated with either
2715  * ni_frame_buffer_alloc or ni_encoder_frame_buffer_alloc or
2716  * ni_frame_buffer_alloc_nv
2717  *
2718  * \param[in] p_frame Pointer to a previously allocated ni_frame_t struct
2719  *
2720  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
2721  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
2722  ******************************************************************************/
2723 ni_retcode_t ni_frame_buffer_free(ni_frame_t* p_frame)
2724 {
2725  int i;
2726  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
2727 
2728  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: enter\n", __func__);
2729 
2730  if (!p_frame)
2731  {
2732  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "WARN: %s(): p_frame is NULL\n", __func__);
2733  LRETURN;
2734  }
2735 
2736  if (!p_frame->p_buffer)
2737  {
2738  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "WARN: %s(): already freed, nothing to free\n",
2739  __func__);
2740  }
2741 
2742 #ifndef _WIN32
2743  // If this is a hardware frame with a DMA buf fd attached, close the DMA buf fd
2744  if ((p_frame->data_len[3] > 0) && (p_frame->p_data[3] != NULL))
2745  {
2746  niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_frame->p_data[3];
2747  if ((p_surface->dma_buf_fd > 0) && (p_surface->ui16FrameIdx > 0))
2748  {
2749  // Close the DMA buf fd
2750  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2751  "%s: close p_surface->dma_buf_fd %d "
2752  "ui16FrameIdx %u\n",
2753  __func__, p_surface->dma_buf_fd, p_surface->ui16FrameIdx);
2754  close(p_surface->dma_buf_fd);
2755  }
2756  }
2757 #endif
2758 
2759  ni_aligned_free(p_frame->p_buffer);
2760  p_frame->buffer_size = 0;
2761  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS; i++)
2762  {
2763  p_frame->data_len[i] = 0;
2764  p_frame->p_data[i] = NULL;
2765  }
2766  ni_frame_wipe_aux_data(p_frame);
2767  if (p_frame->p_metadata_buffer)
2768  {
2769  ni_aligned_free(p_frame->p_metadata_buffer);
2770  }
2771 
2772 END:
2773 
2774  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: exit\n", __func__);
2775 
2776  return retval;
2777 }
2778 
2779 /*!*****************************************************************************
2780  * \brief Free decoder frame buffer that was previously allocated with
2781  * ni_decoder_frame_buffer_alloc, returning memory to a buffer pool.
2782  *
2783  * \param[in] p_frame Pointer to a previously allocated ni_frame_t struct
2784  *
2785  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
2786  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
2787  ******************************************************************************/
2788 ni_retcode_t ni_decoder_frame_buffer_free(ni_frame_t *p_frame)
2789 {
2790  int i;
2791  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
2792 
2793  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: enter\n", __func__);
2794 
2795  if (!p_frame)
2796  {
2797  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "WARN: %s(): p_frame is NULL\n", __func__);
2798  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
2799  LRETURN;
2800  }
2801 
2802  if (p_frame->dec_buf)
2803  {
2804  ni_buf_pool_return_buffer(p_frame->dec_buf, (ni_buf_pool_t *)p_frame->dec_buf->pool);
2805  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): Mem buf returned ptr %p buf %p !\n", __func__,
2806  p_frame->dec_buf->buf, p_frame->dec_buf);
2807  }
2808  else
2809  {
2810  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): NO mem buf returned !\n", __func__);
2811  }
2812 
2813  p_frame->dec_buf = NULL;
2814  p_frame->p_buffer = NULL;
2815  p_frame->buffer_size = 0;
2816  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS; i++)
2817  {
2818  p_frame->data_len[i] = 0;
2819  p_frame->p_data[i] = NULL;
2820  }
2821  ni_frame_wipe_aux_data(p_frame);
2822 
2823 END:
2824 
2825  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: exit\n", __func__);
2826 
2827  return retval;
2828 }
2829 
2830 /*!*****************************************************************************
2831  * \brief Return a memory buffer to memory buffer pool.
2832  *
2833  * \param[in] buf Buffer to be returned.
2834  * \param[in] p_buffer_pool Buffer pool to return buffer to.
2835  *
2836  * \return None
2837  ******************************************************************************/
2838 void ni_decoder_frame_buffer_pool_return_buf(ni_buf_t *buf,
2839  ni_buf_pool_t *p_buffer_pool)
2840 {
2841  ni_buf_pool_return_buffer(buf, p_buffer_pool);
2842 }
2843 
2844 /*!*****************************************************************************
2845  * \brief Allocate memory for the packet buffer based on provided packet size
2846  *
2847  * \param[in] p_packet Pointer to a caller allocated
2848  * ni_packet_t struct
2849  * \param[in] packet_size Required allocation size
2850  *
2851  * \return On success
2852  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
2853  * On failure
2854  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
2855  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
2856  ******************************************************************************/
2857 ni_retcode_t ni_packet_buffer_alloc(ni_packet_t* p_packet, int packet_size)
2858 {
2859  void* p_buffer = NULL;
2860  int metadata_size = 0;
2861 
2862  metadata_size = NI_FW_META_DATA_SZ;
2863 
2864  int buffer_size = (((packet_size + metadata_size) / NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ) + 1) * NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ;
2865 
2866  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: packet_size=%d\n", __func__,
2867  packet_size + metadata_size);
2868 
2869  if (!p_packet || !packet_size)
2870  {
2871  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s: null pointer parameters passed\n",
2872  __func__);
2873  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
2874  }
2875 
2876  if (buffer_size % NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT)
2877  {
2878  buffer_size = ( (buffer_size / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT ) + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
2879  }
2880 
2881  if (p_packet->buffer_size == buffer_size)
2882  {
2883  // Already allocated the exact size.
2884  p_packet->p_data = p_packet->p_buffer;
2885  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: reuse current p_packet buffer\n", __func__);
2886  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: exit: p_packet->buffer_size=%u\n", __func__,
2887  p_packet->buffer_size);
2888  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
2889  }
2890 
2891  if (p_packet->buffer_size)
2892  {
2893  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2894  "%s: free current p_packet, p_packet->buffer_size=%u\n", __func__,
2895  p_packet->buffer_size);
2896  ni_packet_buffer_free(p_packet);
2897  }
2898 
2899  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: Allocating p_frame buffer, buffer_size=%d\n",
2900  __func__, buffer_size);
2901 
2902  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
2903  {
2904  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate p_packet buffer.\n",
2905  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
2906  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: exit: p_packet->buffer_size=%u\n", __func__,
2907  p_packet->buffer_size);
2908  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
2909  }
2910 
2911  p_packet->buffer_size = buffer_size;
2912  p_packet->p_buffer = p_buffer;
2913  p_packet->p_data = p_packet->p_buffer;
2914 
2915  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: exit: p_packet->buffer_size=%u\n", __func__,
2916  p_packet->buffer_size);
2917 
2918  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
2919 }
2920 
2921 /*!*****************************************************************************
2922  * \brief Allocate packet buffer using a user provided pointer, the memory
2923  * is expected to have already been allocated.
2924  *
2925  * For ideal performance memory should be 4k aligned. If it is not 4K aligned
2926  * then a temporary 4k aligned memory will be used to copy data to and from
2927  * when writing and reading. This will negatively impact performance.
2928  *
2929  * This API will overwrite p_packet->buffer_size, p_packet->p_buffer and
2930  * p_packet->p_data fields in p_packet.
2931  *
2932  * This API will not free any memory associated with p_packet->p_buffer and
2933  * p_packet->p_data fields in p_packet.
2934  * Common use case could be,
2935  * 1. Allocate memory to pointer
2936  * 2. Call ni_custom_packet_buffer_alloc() with allocated pointer.
2937  * 3. Use p_packet as required.
2938  * 4. Call ni_packet_buffer_free() to free up the memory.
2939  *
2940  * \param[in] p_buffer User provided pointer to be used for buffer
2941  * \param[in] p_packet Pointer to a caller allocated
2942  * ni_packet_t struct
2943  * \param[in] buffer_size Buffer size
2944  *
2945  * \return On success
2946  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
2947  * On failure
2948  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
2949  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
2950  ******************************************************************************/
2951 ni_retcode_t ni_custom_packet_buffer_alloc(void *p_buffer,
2952  ni_packet_t *p_packet,
2953  int buffer_size)
2954 {
2955  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter buffer_size=%d\n", __func__, buffer_size);
2956 
2957  if (!p_buffer || !p_packet || !buffer_size)
2958  {
2959  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s: null pointer parameters passed\n",
2960  __func__);
2961  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
2962  }
2963  if (((uintptr_t)p_buffer) % NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT)
2964  {
2965  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "Info: %s: Warning buffer not 4k aligned = %p!. Will do an extra copy\n",
2966  __func__, p_buffer);
2967  }
2968 
2969  p_packet->buffer_size = buffer_size;
2970  p_packet->p_buffer = p_buffer;
2971  p_packet->p_data = p_packet->p_buffer;
2972 
2973  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: exit: \n", __func__);
2974 
2975  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
2976 }
2977 
2978 /*!*****************************************************************************
2979  * \brief Free packet buffer that was previously allocated with
2980  * ni_packet_buffer_alloc
2981  *
2982  * \param[in] p_packet Pointer to a previously allocated ni_packet_t struct
2983  *
2984  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
2985  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
2986  ******************************************************************************/
2987 ni_retcode_t ni_packet_buffer_free(ni_packet_t* p_packet)
2988 {
2989  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
2990 
2991  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
2992 
2993  if (!p_packet)
2994  {
2995  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): p_packet is NULL\n", __func__);
2996  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
2997  LRETURN;
2998  }
2999 
3000  if (!p_packet->p_buffer)
3001  {
3002  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): already freed, nothing to free\n", __func__);
3003  LRETURN;
3004  }
3005 
3006  ni_aligned_free(p_packet->p_buffer);
3007  p_packet->p_buffer = NULL;
3008  p_packet->buffer_size = 0;
3009  p_packet->data_len = 0;
3010  p_packet->p_data = NULL;
3011 
3012  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
3013 
3014 END:
3015 
3016  return retval;
3017 }
3018 
3019 /*!*****************************************************************************
3020  * \brief Free packet buffer that was previously allocated with
3021  * ni_packet_buffer_alloc for AV1 packets merge
3022  *
3023  * \param[in] p_packet Pointer to a previously allocated ni_packet_t struct
3024  *
3025  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
3026  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
3027  ******************************************************************************/
3028 ni_retcode_t ni_packet_buffer_free_av1(ni_packet_t *p_packet)
3029 {
3030  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
3031  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
3032  int i;
3033 
3034  if (!p_packet)
3035  {
3036  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): p_packet is NULL\n", __func__);
3037  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
3038  LRETURN;
3039  }
3040 
3041  if (!p_packet->av1_buffer_index)
3042  {
3043  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
3044  "%s(): no need to free previous av1 packet buffers\n", __func__);
3045  LRETURN;
3046  }
3047 
3048  for (i = 0; i < p_packet->av1_buffer_index; i++)
3049  {
3050  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): free previous av1 packet buffer %d\n",
3051  __func__, i);
3052  ni_aligned_free(p_packet->av1_p_buffer[i]);
3053  p_packet->av1_p_buffer[i] = NULL;
3054  p_packet->av1_p_data[i] = NULL;
3055  p_packet->av1_buffer_size[i] = 0;
3056  p_packet->av1_data_len[i] = 0;
3057  }
3058 
3059  p_packet->av1_buffer_index = 0;
3060 
3061 END:
3062 
3063  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
3064 
3065  return retval;
3066 }
3067 
3068 /*!*****************************************************************************
3069  * \brief Copy video packet accounting for alignment
3070  *
3071  * \param[in] p_destination Destination to where to copy to
3072  * \param[in] p_source Source from where to copy from
3073  * \param[in] cur_size current size
3074  * \param[out] p_leftover Pointer to the data that was left over
3075  * \param[out] p_prev_size Size of the data leftover ??
3076  *
3077  * \return On success Total number of bytes that were copied
3078  * On failure NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
3079  ******************************************************************************/
3080 int ni_packet_copy(void* p_destination, const void* const p_source, int cur_size, void* p_leftover, int* p_prev_size)
3081 {
3082  int copy_size = 0;
3083  int padding_size = 0;
3084  int prev_size = p_prev_size == NULL? 0 : *p_prev_size;
3085 
3086  int total_size = cur_size + prev_size;
3087  uint8_t* p_src = (uint8_t*)p_source;
3088  uint8_t* p_dst = (uint8_t*)p_destination;
3089  uint8_t* p_lftover = (uint8_t*)p_leftover;
3090 
3091  if (!p_prev_size)
3092  {
3093  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
3094  }
3095 
3096  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter, *prev_size=%d\n", __func__, *p_prev_size);
3097 
3098  if ((0 == cur_size) && (0 == prev_size))
3099  {
3100  return copy_size;
3101  }
3102 
3103  if (((0 != cur_size) && (!p_source)) || (!p_destination) || (!p_leftover))
3104  {
3105  return NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
3106  }
3107 
3108  copy_size = ((total_size + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
3109 
3110  if (copy_size > total_size)
3111  {
3112  padding_size = copy_size - total_size;
3113  }
3114 
3115  if (prev_size > 0)
3116  {
3117  memcpy(p_dst, p_lftover, prev_size);
3118  }
3119 
3120  p_dst += prev_size;
3121 
3122  memcpy(p_dst, p_src, cur_size);
3123 
3124  if (padding_size)
3125  {
3126  p_dst += cur_size;
3127  memset(p_dst, 0, padding_size);
3128  }
3129 
3130  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE,
3131  "%s(): exit, cur_size=%d, copy_size=%d, "
3132  "prev_size=%d, padding_size=%d\n", __func__, cur_size,
3133  copy_size, *p_prev_size, padding_size);
3134 
3135  *p_prev_size = 0;
3136 
3137  return copy_size;
3138 }
3139 
3140 /*!*****************************************************************************
3141  * \brief Add a new auxiliary data to a frame
3142  *
3143  * \param[in/out] frame a frame to which the auxiliary data should be added
3144  * \param[in] type type of the added auxiliary data
3145  * \param[in] data_size size of the added auxiliary data
3146  *
3147  * \return a pointer to the newly added aux data on success, NULL otherwise
3148  ******************************************************************************/
3149 ni_aux_data_t *ni_frame_new_aux_data(ni_frame_t *frame, ni_aux_data_type_t type,
3150  int data_size)
3151 {
3152  ni_aux_data_t *ret;
3153 
3154  if (frame->nb_aux_data >= NI_MAX_NUM_AUX_DATA_PER_FRAME ||
3155  !(ret = malloc(sizeof(ni_aux_data_t))))
3156  {
3157  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3158  "ERROR: %s No memory or exceeding max aux_data number !\n",
3159  __func__);
3160  return NULL;
3161  }
3162 
3163  ret->type = type;
3164  ret->size = data_size;
3165  ret->data = calloc(1, data_size);
3166  if (!ret->data)
3167  {
3168  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s No memory for aux data !\n", __func__);
3169  ni_aligned_free(ret);
3170  } else
3171  {
3172  frame->aux_data[frame->nb_aux_data++] = ret;
3173  }
3174 
3175  return ret;
3176 }
3177 
3178 /*!*****************************************************************************
3179  * \brief Add a new auxiliary data to a frame and copy in the raw data
3180  *
3181  * \param[in/out] frame a frame to which the auxiliary data should be added
3182  * \param[in] type type of the added auxiliary data
3183  * \param[in] raw_data the raw data of the aux data
3184  * \param[in] data_size size of the added auxiliary data
3185  *
3186  * \return a pointer to the newly added aux data on success, NULL otherwise
3187  ******************************************************************************/
3188 ni_aux_data_t *ni_frame_new_aux_data_from_raw_data(ni_frame_t *frame,
3189  ni_aux_data_type_t type,
3190  const uint8_t *raw_data,
3191  int data_size)
3192 {
3193  ni_aux_data_t *ret = ni_frame_new_aux_data(frame, type, data_size);
3194  if (ret)
3195  {
3196  memcpy(ret->data, raw_data, data_size);
3197  }
3198  return ret;
3199 }
3200 
3201 /*!*****************************************************************************
3202  * \brief Retrieve from the frame auxiliary data of a given type if exists
3203  *
3204  * \param[in] frame a frame from which the auxiliary data should be retrieved
3205  * \param[in] type type of the auxiliary data to be retrieved
3206  *
3207  * \return a pointer to the aux data of a given type on success, NULL otherwise
3208  ******************************************************************************/
3209 ni_aux_data_t *ni_frame_get_aux_data(const ni_frame_t *frame,
3210  ni_aux_data_type_t type)
3211 {
3212  int i;
3213  for (i = 0; i < frame->nb_aux_data; i++)
3214  {
3215  if (frame->aux_data[i]->type == type)
3216  {
3217  return frame->aux_data[i];
3218  }
3219  }
3220  return NULL;
3221 }
3222 
3223 /*!*****************************************************************************
3224  * \brief If auxiliary data of the given type exists in the frame, free it
3225  * and remove it from the frame.
3226  *
3227  * \param[in/out] frame a frame from which the auxiliary data should be removed
3228  * \param[in] type type of the auxiliary data to be removed
3229  *
3230  * \return None
3231  ******************************************************************************/
3232 void ni_frame_free_aux_data(ni_frame_t *frame, ni_aux_data_type_t type)
3233 {
3234  int i;
3235  ni_aux_data_t *aux;
3236 
3237  for (i = 0; i < frame->nb_aux_data; i++)
3238  {
3239  aux = frame->aux_data[i];
3240  if (aux->type == type)
3241  {
3242  frame->aux_data[i] = frame->aux_data[frame->nb_aux_data - 1];
3243  frame->aux_data[frame->nb_aux_data - 1] = NULL;
3244  frame->nb_aux_data--;
3245  ni_aligned_free(aux->data);
3246  ni_aligned_free(aux);
3247  }
3248  }
3249 }
3250 
3251 /*!*****************************************************************************
3252  * \brief Free and remove all auxiliary data from the frame.
3253  *
3254  * \param[in/out] frame a frame from which the auxiliary data should be removed
3255  *
3256  * \return None
3257  ******************************************************************************/
3258 void ni_frame_wipe_aux_data(ni_frame_t *frame)
3259 {
3260  int i;
3261  ni_aux_data_t *aux;
3262 
3263  for (i = 0; i < frame->nb_aux_data; i++)
3264  {
3265  aux = frame->aux_data[i];
3266  ni_aligned_free(aux->data);
3267  ni_aligned_free(aux);
3268  }
3269  frame->nb_aux_data = 0;
3270 }
3271 
3272 /*!*****************************************************************************
3273  * \brief Initialize default encoder parameters
3274  *
3275  * \param[out] param Pointer to a user allocated ni_xcoder_params_t
3276  * to initialize to default parameters
3277  * \param[in] fps_num Frames per second
3278  * \param[in] fps_denom FPS denomination
3279  * \param[in] bit_rate bit rate
3280  * \param[in] width frame width
3281  * \param[in] height frame height
3282  * \param[in] codec_format codec from ni_codec_format_t
3283  *
3284  * \return On success
3285  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
3286  * On failure
3287  * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
3288  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
3289  ******************************************************************************/
3290 ni_retcode_t ni_encoder_init_default_params(ni_xcoder_params_t *p_param,
3291  int fps_num, int fps_denom,
3292  long bit_rate, int width,
3293  int height,
3294  ni_codec_format_t codec_format)
3295 {
3296  ni_encoder_cfg_params_t *p_enc = NULL;
3297  int i = 0;
3298  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
3299 
3300  //Initialize p_param structure
3301  if (!p_param)
3302  {
3303  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): null pointer parameters passed\n",
3304  __func__);
3305  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
3306  LRETURN;
3307  }
3308 
3309  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s()\n", __func__);
3310 
3311  //Initialize p_param structure
3312  memset(p_param, 0, sizeof(ni_xcoder_params_t));
3313 
3314  p_enc = &p_param->cfg_enc_params;
3315 
3316  // Rev. B: unified for HEVC/H.264
3317  p_enc->profile = 0;
3318  p_enc->level_idc = 0;
3319  p_enc->high_tier = 0;
3320 
3321  if (QUADRA)
3322  p_enc->gop_preset_index = GOP_PRESET_IDX_DEFAULT;
3323  else
3324  p_enc->gop_preset_index = GOP_PRESET_IDX_IBBBP;
3325 
3326  p_enc->use_recommend_enc_params =
3327  0; // TBD: remove this param from API as it is revA specific
3328  p_enc->cu_size_mode = 7;
3329  p_enc->max_num_merge = 2;
3330  p_enc->enable_dynamic_8x8_merge = 1;
3331  p_enc->enable_dynamic_16x16_merge = 1;
3332  p_enc->enable_dynamic_32x32_merge = 1;
3333 
3334  p_enc->rc.trans_rate = 0;
3335 
3336  p_enc->rc.enable_rate_control = 0;
3337  if (QUADRA)
3338  p_enc->rc.enable_cu_level_rate_control = 0;
3339  else
3340  p_enc->rc.enable_cu_level_rate_control = 1;
3341  p_enc->rc.enable_hvs_qp = 0;
3342  p_enc->rc.enable_hvs_qp_scale = 1;
3343  p_enc->rc.hvs_qp_scale = 2;
3344  p_enc->rc.min_qp = 8;
3345  p_enc->rc.max_qp = 51;
3346  p_enc->rc.max_delta_qp = 10;
3347 
3348  // hrd is disabled if vbv_buffer_size=0, hrd is enabled if vbv_buffer_size is [10, 3000]
3349  p_enc->rc.vbv_buffer_size = 3000;
3350  p_enc->rc.enable_filler = 0;
3351  p_enc->rc.enable_pic_skip = 0;
3352 
3353  p_enc->roi_enable = 0;
3354 
3355  p_enc->forced_header_enable = NI_ENC_REPEAT_HEADERS_ALL_I_FRAMES;
3356 
3357  p_enc->long_term_ref_enable = 0;
3358  p_enc->long_term_ref_interval = 0;
3359  p_enc->long_term_ref_count = 2;
3360 
3361  p_enc->conf_win_top = 0;
3362  p_enc->conf_win_bottom = 0;
3363  p_enc->conf_win_left = 0;
3364  p_enc->conf_win_right = 0;
3365 
3366  p_enc->intra_period = 120;
3367  p_enc->rc.intra_qp = 22;
3368  p_enc->rc.intra_qp_delta = -2;
3369  // TBD Rev. B: could be shared for HEVC and H.264 ?
3370  if (QUADRA)
3371  p_enc->rc.enable_mb_level_rc = 0;
3372  else
3373  p_enc->rc.enable_mb_level_rc = 1;
3374 
3375  p_enc->decoding_refresh_type = 1;
3376 
3377  // Rev. B: H.264 only parameters.
3378  p_enc->enable_transform_8x8 = 1;
3379  p_enc->avc_slice_mode = 0;
3380  p_enc->avc_slice_arg = 0;
3381  p_enc->entropy_coding_mode = 1;
3382 
3383  p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_mode = 0;
3384  p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_arg = 0;
3385  p_enc->intra_reset_refresh = 0;
3386 
3387  p_enc->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size = 0;
3388 #ifndef QUADRA
3389  if (!QUADRA)
3390  {
3391  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_GOP_NUM; i++)
3392  {
3393  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type = PIC_TYPE_I;
3394  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset = 0;
3395  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_qp = 0;
3396  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pic_L0 = 0;
3397  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L0 = 0;
3398  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L1 = 0;
3399  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id = 0;
3400  }
3401  }
3402  else // QUADRA
3403 #endif
3404  {
3405  int j;
3406  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_GOP_NUM; i++)
3407  {
3408  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset = 0;
3409  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_offset = 0;
3410  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_factor =
3411  (float)0.3; // QP Factor range is between 0.3 and 1, higher values mean lower quality and less bits
3412  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id = 0;
3413  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type = PIC_TYPE_I;
3414  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pics= 0;
3415  for (j = 0; j < NI_MAX_REF_PIC; j++)
3416  {
3417  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic = 0;
3418  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic_used = 0;
3419  }
3420  }
3421  }
3422 
3423  p_param->source_width = width;
3424  p_param->source_height = height;
3425 
3426  p_param->fps_number = fps_num;
3427  p_param->fps_denominator = fps_denom;
3428 
3429  if (p_param->fps_number && p_param->fps_denominator)
3430  {
3431  p_enc->frame_rate = (int)(p_param->fps_number / p_param->fps_denominator);
3432  }
3433  else
3434  {
3435  p_enc->frame_rate = 30;
3436  }
3437 
3438  p_param->bitrate = (int)bit_rate;
3439  p_param->roi_demo_mode = 0;
3440  p_param->reconf_demo_mode = 0; // NETINT_INTERNAL - currently only for internal testing
3441  p_param->force_pic_qp_demo_mode = 0;
3442  p_param->force_frame_type = 0;
3443  p_param->hdrEnableVUI = 0;
3444  p_param->cacheRoi = 0;
3445  p_param->low_delay_mode = 0;
3446  p_param->padding = 1;
3447  p_param->generate_enc_hdrs = 0;
3448  p_param->use_low_delay_poc_type = 0;
3449  p_param->rootBufId = 0;
3450  p_param->staticMmapThreshold = 0;
3451 
3452  p_enc->preferred_transfer_characteristics = -1;
3453 
3454  p_param->dolby_vision_profile = 0;
3455 
3456  // encoder stream header VUI setting
3457  p_param->color_primaries = 2; // default COL_PRI_UNSPECIFIED
3458  p_param->color_transfer_characteristic = 2; // default COL_TRC_UNSPECIFIED
3459  p_param->color_space = 2; // default COL_SPC_UNSPECIFIED
3460  p_param->sar_num = 0; // default SAR numerator 0
3461  p_param->sar_denom = 1; // default SAR denominator 1
3462  p_param->video_full_range_flag = -1;
3463 
3464  //QUADRA
3465  p_enc->EnableAUD = 0;
3466  p_enc->lookAheadDepth = 0;
3467  p_enc->rdoLevel = 1;
3468  p_enc->crf = -1;
3469  p_enc->HDR10MaxLight = 0;
3470  p_enc->HDR10AveLight = 0;
3471  p_enc->HDR10CLLEnable = 0;
3472  p_enc->EnableRdoQuant = 0;
3473  p_enc->ctbRcMode = 0;
3474  p_enc->gopSize = 0;
3475  p_enc->gopLowdelay = 0;
3476  p_enc->gdrDuration = 0;
3477  p_enc->hrdEnable = 0;
3478  p_enc->ltrRefInterval = 0;
3479  p_enc->ltrRefQpOffset = 0;
3480  p_enc->ltrFirstGap = 0;
3481  p_enc->ltrNextInterval = 1;
3482  p_enc->multicoreJointMode = 0;
3483  p_enc->qlevel = -1;
3484  p_enc->maxFrameSize = 0;
3485  p_enc->chromaQpOffset = 0;
3486  p_enc->tolCtbRcInter = (float)0.1;
3487  p_enc->tolCtbRcIntra = (float)0.1;
3488  p_enc->bitrateWindow = -255;
3489  p_enc->inLoopDSRatio = 1;
3490  p_enc->blockRCSize = 0;
3491  p_enc->rcQpDeltaRange = 10;
3492  p_enc->aspectRatioWidth = 0;
3493  p_enc->aspectRatioHeight = 1;
3494  p_enc->keep_alive_timeout = NI_DEFAULT_KEEP_ALIVE_TIMEOUT;
3495  p_enc->enable_ssim = 0;
3496  p_enc->HDR10Enable = 0;
3497  p_enc->HDR10dx0 = 0;
3498  p_enc->HDR10dy0 = 0;
3499  p_enc->HDR10dx1 = 0;
3500  p_enc->HDR10dy1 = 0;
3501  p_enc->HDR10dx2 = 0;
3502  p_enc->HDR10dy2 = 0;
3503  p_enc->HDR10wx = 0;
3504  p_enc->HDR10wy = 0;
3505  p_enc->HDR10maxluma = 0;
3506  p_enc->HDR10minluma = 0;
3507  p_enc->av1_error_resilient_mode = 0;
3508 
3509  if (codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1)
3510  {
3511  if (p_param->source_width < NI_PARAM_AV1_MIN_WIDTH)
3512  {
3513  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_WIDTH_TOO_SMALL;
3514  LRETURN;
3515  }
3516  if (p_param->source_height < NI_PARAM_AV1_MIN_HEIGHT)
3517  {
3518  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_HEIGHT_TOO_SMALL;
3519  LRETURN;
3520  }
3521  if (p_param->source_width > NI_PARAM_AV1_MAX_WIDTH)
3522  {
3523  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_WIDTH_TOO_BIG;
3524  LRETURN;
3525  }
3526  if (p_param->source_height > NI_PARAM_AV1_MAX_HEIGHT)
3527  {
3528  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_HEIGHT_TOO_BIG;
3529  LRETURN;
3530  }
3531  if (p_param->source_height * p_param->source_width >
3532  NI_PARAM_AV1_MAX_AREA)
3533  {
3534  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_AREA_TOO_BIG;
3535  LRETURN;
3536  }
3537  // AV1 8x8 alignment HW limitation is now worked around by FW cropping input resolution
3538  if (p_param->source_width % NI_PARAM_AV1_ALIGN_WIDTH_HEIGHT)
3539  {
3540  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "AV1 Picture Width not aligned to %d - picture will be cropped\n",
3541  NI_PARAM_AV1_ALIGN_WIDTH_HEIGHT);
3542  }
3543  if (p_param->source_height % NI_PARAM_AV1_ALIGN_WIDTH_HEIGHT)
3544  {
3545  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "AV1 Picture Height not aligned to %d - picture will be cropped\n",
3546  NI_PARAM_AV1_ALIGN_WIDTH_HEIGHT);
3547  }
3548  }
3549 
3550  if (codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_JPEG)
3551  {
3552  if (p_param->source_width < NI_PARAM_JPEG_MIN_WIDTH)
3553  {
3554  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_WIDTH_TOO_SMALL;
3555  LRETURN;
3556  }
3557  if (p_param->source_height < NI_PARAM_JPEG_MIN_HEIGHT)
3558  {
3559  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_HEIGHT_TOO_SMALL;
3560  LRETURN;
3561  }
3562  }
3563 
3564  if (p_param->source_width > NI_PARAM_MAX_WIDTH)
3565  {
3566  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_WIDTH_TOO_BIG;
3567  LRETURN;
3568  }
3569  if (p_param->source_width < NI_PARAM_MIN_WIDTH)
3570  {
3571  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_WIDTH_TOO_SMALL;
3572  LRETURN;
3573  }
3574 
3575  if (p_param->source_height > NI_PARAM_MAX_HEIGHT)
3576  {
3577  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_HEIGHT_TOO_BIG;
3578  LRETURN;
3579  }
3580  if (p_param->source_height < NI_PARAM_MIN_HEIGHT)
3581  {
3582  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_HEIGHT_TOO_SMALL;
3583  LRETURN;
3584  }
3585  if (p_param->source_height*p_param->source_width > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_AREA)
3586  {
3587  retval = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_AREA_TOO_BIG;
3588  LRETURN;
3589  }
3590 
3591 END:
3592 
3593  return retval;
3594 }
3595 
3596 /*!*****************************************************************************
3597  * \brief Initialize default decoder parameters
3598  *
3599  * \param[out] param Pointer to a user allocated ni_xcoder_params_t
3600  * to initialize to default parameters
3601  * \param[in] fps_num Frames per second
3602  * \param[in] fps_denom FPS denomination
3603  * \param[in] bit_rate bit rate
3604  * \param[in] width frame width
3605  * \param[in] height frame height
3606  *
3607  * \return On success
3608  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
3609  * On failure
3610  * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
3611  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
3612  ******************************************************************************/
3613 ni_retcode_t ni_decoder_init_default_params(ni_xcoder_params_t *p_param,
3614  int fps_num, int fps_denom,
3615  long bit_rate, int width,
3616  int height)
3617 {
3618  ni_decoder_input_params_t* p_dec = NULL;
3619  int i;
3620  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
3621 
3622  //Initialize p_param structure
3623  if (!p_param)
3624  {
3625  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): null pointer parameter passed\n",
3626  __func__);
3627  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
3628  LRETURN;
3629  }
3630 
3631  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s\n", __func__);
3632 
3633  //Initialize p_param structure
3634  memset(p_param, 0, sizeof(ni_xcoder_params_t));
3635 
3636  p_dec = &p_param->dec_input_params;
3637 
3638  p_param->source_width = width;
3639  p_param->source_height = height;
3640 
3641  p_param->fps_number = fps_num;
3642  p_param->fps_denominator = fps_denom;
3643 
3644  p_dec->hwframes = 0;
3645  p_dec->mcmode = 0;
3646  p_dec->nb_save_pkt = 0;
3647  p_dec->enable_out1 = 0;
3648  p_dec->enable_out2 = 0;
3649  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS; i++)
3650  {
3651  p_dec->force_8_bit[i] = 0;
3652  p_dec->semi_planar[i] = 0;
3653  p_dec->crop_mode[i] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_AUTO;
3654  p_dec->crop_whxy[i][0] = width;
3655  p_dec->crop_whxy[i][1] = height;
3656  p_dec->crop_whxy[i][2] = 0;
3657  p_dec->crop_whxy[i][3] = 0;
3658  p_dec->scale_wh[i][0] = 0;
3659  p_dec->scale_wh[i][1] = 0;
3660 
3661  }
3662  p_dec->keep_alive_timeout = NI_DEFAULT_KEEP_ALIVE_TIMEOUT;
3663  p_dec->decoder_low_delay = 0;
3664  p_dec->enable_user_data_sei_passthru = 0;
3665  p_dec->custom_sei_passthru = -1;
3666 
3667  //-------init unused param start----------
3668 
3669  p_param->bitrate = (int)bit_rate;
3670  p_param->reconf_demo_mode = 0; // NETINT_INTERNAL - currently only for internal testing
3671  p_param->force_pic_qp_demo_mode = 0;
3672  p_param->force_frame_type = 0;
3673  p_param->hdrEnableVUI = 0;
3674  p_param->cacheRoi = 0;
3675  p_param->low_delay_mode = 0;
3676  p_param->padding = 1;
3677  p_param->generate_enc_hdrs = 0;
3678  p_param->use_low_delay_poc_type = 0;
3679  p_param->dolby_vision_profile = 0;
3680 
3681  // encoder stream header VUI setting
3682  p_param->color_primaries = 2; // default COL_PRI_UNSPECIFIED
3683  p_param->color_transfer_characteristic = 2; // default COL_TRC_UNSPECIFIED
3684  p_param->color_space = 2; // default COL_SPC_UNSPECIFIED
3685  p_param->sar_num = 0; // default SAR numerator 0
3686  p_param->sar_denom = 1; // default SAR denominator 1
3687  p_param->video_full_range_flag = -1;
3688 
3689  //-------init unused param done----------
3690 
3691 END:
3692 
3693  return retval;
3694 }
3695 
3696 // read demo reconfig data file and parse out reconfig key/values in the format:
3697 // key:val1,val2,val3,...val9 (max 9 values); only digit/:/,/newline is allowed
3698 ni_retcode_t ni_parse_reconf_file(const char *reconf_file,
3699  int hash_map[][NI_BITRATE_RECONFIG_FILE_MAX_ENTRIES_PER_LINE])
3700 {
3701  char keyChar[10] = "";
3702  int key;
3703  char valChar[10] = "";
3704  int val;
3705  int valIdx = 1;
3706  int parseKey = 1;
3707  int idx = 0;
3708  int readc = EOF;
3709  FILE *reconf = NULL;
3710 
3711  if (!reconf_file)
3712  {
3713  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null pointer parameters passed\n",
3714  __func__);
3715  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
3716  }
3717 
3718  reconf = fopen(reconf_file, "r");
3719  if (!reconf)
3720  {
3721  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s(): Cannot open reconfig_file: %s\n",
3722  NI_ERRNO, __func__, reconf_file);
3723  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
3724  }
3725  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
3726 
3727  while ((readc = fgetc(reconf)) != EOF)
3728  {
3729  //parse lines
3730  if (isdigit(readc))
3731  {
3732  if (parseKey)
3733  {
3734  strncat(keyChar, (const char *)(&readc), 1);
3735  }
3736  else
3737  {
3738  strncat(valChar, (const char *)(&readc), 1);
3739  }
3740  }
3741  else if (readc == ':')
3742  {
3743  parseKey = 0;
3744  key = atoi(keyChar);
3745  hash_map[idx][0] = key;
3746  }
3747  else if (readc == ',')
3748  {
3749  if (valIdx >= NI_BITRATE_RECONFIG_FILE_MAX_ENTRIES_PER_LINE)
3750  {
3751  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3752  "ERROR: Number of entries per line in reconfig file is greater then the "
3753  "limit of %d\n",
3754  NI_BITRATE_RECONFIG_FILE_MAX_ENTRIES_PER_LINE);
3755  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
3756  break;
3757  }
3758  val = atoi(valChar);
3759  hash_map[idx][valIdx] = val;
3760  valIdx++;
3761  memset(valChar, 0, 10);
3762  }
3763  else if (readc == '\n')
3764  {
3765  if (idx >= NI_BITRATE_RECONFIG_FILE_MAX_LINES)
3766  {
3767  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3768  "ERROR: Number of lines in reconfig file is greater then the "
3769  "limit of %d\n",
3770  NI_BITRATE_RECONFIG_FILE_MAX_LINES);
3771  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
3772  break;
3773  }
3774  parseKey = 1;
3775  val = atoi (valChar);
3776  hash_map[idx][valIdx] = val;
3777  valIdx = 1;
3778  memset(keyChar,0,10);
3779  memset(valChar,0,10);
3780  idx ++;
3781  }
3782  else
3783  {
3784  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: character %c in reconfig file. this may lead to mistaken reconfiguration values\n", readc);
3785  }
3786  }
3787 
3788  fclose(reconf);
3789 
3790  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS == retval && parseKey != 1)
3791  {
3792  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3793  "ERROR %d: %s(): Incorrect format / "
3794  "incomplete Key/Value pair in reconfig_file: %s\n",
3795  NI_ERRNO, __func__, reconf_file);
3796  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_ZERO;
3797  }
3798 
3799  return retval;
3800 }
3801 
3802 
3803 #undef atoi
3804 #undef atof
3805 #define atoi(p_str) ni_atoi(p_str, &b_error)
3806 #define atof(p_str) ni_atof(p_str, &b_error)
3807 #define atobool(p_str) (ni_atobool(p_str, &b_error))
3808 /*!*****************************************************************************
3809 * \brief Set value referenced by name in decoder parameters structure
3810 *
3811 * \param[in] p_params Pointer to a user allocated ni_xcoder_params_t (used
3812 * for decoder too for now ) to find and set a particular
3813 * parameter
3814 * \param[in] name String represented parameter name to search
3815 * \param[in] value Parameter value to set
3816 *
3817 * \return On success
3818 * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
3819 * On failure
3820 * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
3821 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
3822 *******************************************************************************/
3823 ni_retcode_t ni_decoder_params_set_value(ni_xcoder_params_t *p_params,
3824  const char *name, char *value)
3825 {
3826  bool b_error = false;
3827  bool bNameWasBool = false;
3828  bool bValueWasNull = !value;
3829  ni_decoder_input_params_t* p_dec = &p_params->dec_input_params;
3830  char nameBuf[64] = { 0 };
3831  const char delim[2] = ",";
3832  const char xdelim[2] = "x";
3833  char *chunk;//for parsing out multi param input
3834  int i, j, k;
3835 
3836  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
3837 
3838  if (!p_params)
3839  {
3840  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null pointer parameters passed\n",
3841  __func__);
3842  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
3843  }
3844 
3845  if (!name)
3846  {
3847  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null name pointer parameters passed\n",
3848  __func__);
3849  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_NAME;
3850  }
3851 
3852  // skip -- prefix if provided
3853  if (name[0] == '-' && name[1] == '-')
3854  {
3855  name += 2;
3856  }
3857 
3858  // s/_/-/g
3859  if (strlen(name) + 1 < sizeof(nameBuf) && strchr(name, '_'))
3860  {
3861  char* c;
3862  strcpy(nameBuf, name);
3863  while ((c = strchr(nameBuf, '_')) != 0)
3864  {
3865  *c = '-';
3866  }
3867 
3868  name = nameBuf;
3869  }
3870 
3871  if (!strncmp(name, "no-", 3))
3872  {
3873  name += 3;
3874  value = !value || ni_atobool(value, &b_error) ? "false" : "true";
3875  }
3876  else if (!strncmp(name, "no", 2))
3877  {
3878  name += 2;
3879  value = !value || ni_atobool(value, &b_error) ? "false" : "true";
3880  }
3881  else if (!value)
3882  {
3883  value = "true";
3884  }
3885  else if (value[0] == '=')
3886  {
3887  value++;
3888  }
3889 
3890 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
3891 #define OPT(STR) else if (!_stricmp(name, STR))
3892 #define OPT2(STR1, STR2) \
3893  else if (!_stricmp(name, STR1) || !_stricmp(name, STR2))
3894 #else
3895 #define OPT(STR) else if (!strcasecmp(name, STR))
3896 #define OPT2(STR1, STR2) else if (!strcasecmp(name, STR1) || !strcasecmp(name, STR2))
3897 #endif
3898  if (0)
3899  ;
3900  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_OUT)
3901  {
3902  if (!strncmp(value, "hw", 2)){
3903  p_dec->hwframes = 1;
3904  }
3905  else if (!strncmp(value, "sw", 2)) {
3906  p_dec->hwframes = 0;
3907  }
3908  else{
3909  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): out can only be <hw,sw> got %s\n",
3910  __func__, value);
3911  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
3912  }
3913  }
3914  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_ENABLE_OUT_1)
3915  {
3916  if (atoi(value) == 1)
3917  p_dec->enable_out1 = 1;
3918  }
3919  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_ENABLE_OUT_2)
3920  {
3921  if (atoi(value) == 1)
3922  p_dec->enable_out2 = 1;
3923  }
3924  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_FORCE_8BIT_0)
3925  {
3926  if (atoi(value) == 1)
3927  p_dec->force_8_bit[0] = 1;
3928  }
3929  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_FORCE_8BIT_1)
3930  {
3931  if (atoi(value) == 1)
3932  p_dec->force_8_bit[1] = 1;
3933  }
3934  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_FORCE_8BIT_2)
3935  {
3936  if (atoi(value) == 1)
3937  p_dec->force_8_bit[2] = 1;
3938  }
3939  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_SEMI_PLANAR_0)
3940  {
3941  if (atoi(value) == 1 || atoi(value) == 2)
3942  p_dec->semi_planar[0] = atoi(value);
3943  }
3944  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_SEMI_PLANAR_1)
3945  {
3946  if (atoi(value) == 1 || atoi(value) == 2)
3947  p_dec->semi_planar[1] = atoi(value);
3948  }
3949  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_SEMI_PLANAR_2)
3950  {
3951  if (atoi(value) == 1 || atoi(value) == 2)
3952  p_dec->semi_planar[2] = atoi(value);
3953  }
3954  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_CROP_MODE_0)
3955  {
3956  if (!strncmp(value, "manual", 6)) {
3957  p_dec->crop_mode[0] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_MANUAL;
3958  }
3959  else if (!strncmp(value, "auto", 4)) {
3960  p_dec->crop_mode[0] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_AUTO;
3961  }
3962 #if 0
3963  else if (!strncmp(value, "disabled", 8)) {
3964  p_dec->crop_mode[0] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_DISABLE;
3965  }
3966 #endif
3967  else{
3968  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3969  "ERROR: %s():cropMode0 input can only be <manual,auto> got %s\n",
3970  __func__, value);
3971  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
3972  }
3973  }
3974  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_CROP_MODE_1)
3975  {
3976  if (!strncmp(value, "manual", 6)) {
3977  p_dec->crop_mode[1] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_MANUAL;
3978  }
3979  else if (!strncmp(value, "auto", 4)) {
3980  p_dec->crop_mode[1] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_AUTO;
3981  }
3982 #if 0
3983  else if (!strncmp(value, "disabled", 8)) {
3984  p_dec->crop_mode[1] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_DISABLE;
3985  }
3986 #endif
3987  else {
3988  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
3989  "ERROR: %s():cropMode1 input can only be <manual,auto> got %s\n",
3990  __func__, value);
3991  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
3992  }
3993  }
3994  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_CROP_MODE_2)
3995  {
3996  if (!strncmp(value, "manual", 6)) {
3997  p_dec->crop_mode[2] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_MANUAL;
3998  }
3999  else if (!strncmp(value, "auto", 4)) {
4000  p_dec->crop_mode[2] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_AUTO;
4001  }
4002 #if 0
4003  else if (!strncmp(value, "disabled", 8)) {
4004  p_dec->crop_mode[2] = NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_DISABLE;
4005  }
4006 #endif
4007  else {
4008  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
4009  "ERROR: %s():cropMode2 input can only be <manual,auto> got %s\n",
4010  __func__, value);
4011  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4012  }
4013  }
4014  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_CROP_PARAM_0)
4015  {
4016  chunk = strtok(value, delim);
4017  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
4018  {
4019  if (chunk != NULL)
4020  {
4021  j = k = 0;
4022  while (chunk[j])
4023  {
4024  if (chunk[j] != '\"' && chunk[j] != '\'')
4025  {
4026  p_dec->cr_expr[0][i][k] = chunk[j];
4027  k++;
4028  }
4029  if (++j > NI_MAX_PPU_PARAM_EXPR_CHAR)
4030  {
4031  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
4032  }
4033  }
4034  chunk = strtok(NULL, delim);
4035  }
4036  else if (i == 2 ) //default offsets to centered image if not specified, may need recalc
4037  {
4038  strcpy(p_dec->cr_expr[0][i], "in_w/2-out_w/2");
4039  }
4040  else if (i == 3)
4041  {
4042  strcpy(p_dec->cr_expr[0][i], "in_h/2-out_h/2");
4043  } else
4044  {
4045  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4046  }
4047  }
4048  }
4049  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_CROP_PARAM_1)
4050  {
4051  chunk = strtok(value, delim);
4052  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
4053  {
4054  if (chunk != NULL)
4055  {
4056  j = k = 0;
4057  while (chunk[j])
4058  {
4059  if (chunk[j] != '\"' && chunk[j] != '\'')
4060  {
4061  p_dec->cr_expr[1][i][k] = chunk[j];
4062  k++;
4063  }
4064  if (++j > NI_MAX_PPU_PARAM_EXPR_CHAR)
4065  {
4066  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
4067  }
4068  }
4069  chunk = strtok(NULL, delim);
4070  }
4071  else if (i == 2) //default offsets to centered image if not specified, may need recalc
4072  {
4073 
4074  strcpy(p_dec->cr_expr[1][i], "in_w/2-out_w/2");
4075  }
4076  else if (i == 3)
4077  {
4078  strcpy(p_dec->cr_expr[1][i], "in_h/2-out_h/2");
4079  }
4080  else
4081  {
4082  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4083  }
4084  }
4085  }
4086  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_CROP_PARAM_2)
4087  {
4088  chunk = strtok(value, delim);
4089  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
4090  {
4091  if (chunk != NULL)
4092  {
4093  j = k = 0;
4094  while (chunk[j])
4095  {
4096  if (chunk[j] != '\"' && chunk[j] != '\'')
4097  {
4098  p_dec->cr_expr[2][i][k] = chunk[j];
4099  k++;
4100  }
4101  if (++j > NI_MAX_PPU_PARAM_EXPR_CHAR)
4102  {
4103  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
4104  }
4105  }
4106  chunk = strtok(NULL, delim);
4107  }
4108  else if (i == 2) //default offsets to centered image if not specified, may need recalc
4109  {
4110 
4111  strcpy(p_dec->cr_expr[2][i], "in_w/2-out_w/2");
4112  }
4113  else if (i == 3)
4114  {
4115  strcpy(p_dec->cr_expr[2][i], "in_h/2-out_h/2");
4116  }
4117  else
4118  {
4119  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4120  }
4121  }
4122  }
4123  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_SCALE_0)
4124  {
4125  chunk = value;
4126  i = 0; // 'x' character counter
4127  while (*chunk++) {
4128  if (*chunk == xdelim[0]) {
4129  i++;
4130  }
4131  }
4132  if (i != 1) {
4133  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4134  }
4135  chunk = NULL;
4136 
4137  chunk = strtok(value, xdelim);
4138  for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
4139  {
4140  if (chunk != NULL)
4141  {
4142  j = k = 0;
4143  while (chunk[j])
4144  {
4145  if (chunk[j] != '\"' && chunk[j] != '\'')
4146  {
4147  p_dec->sc_expr[0][i][k] = chunk[j];
4148  k++;
4149  }
4150  if (++j > NI_MAX_PPU_PARAM_EXPR_CHAR)
4151  {
4152  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
4153  }
4154  }
4155  chunk = strtok(NULL, xdelim);
4156  }
4157  else
4158  {
4159  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4160  }
4161  }
4162  }
4163  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_SCALE_1)
4164  {
4165  chunk = value;
4166  i = 0; // 'x' character counter
4167  while (*chunk++) {
4168  if (*chunk == xdelim[0]) {
4169  i++;
4170  }
4171  }
4172  if (i != 1) {
4173  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4174  }
4175  chunk = NULL;
4176 
4177  chunk = strtok(value, xdelim);
4178  for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
4179  {
4180  if (chunk != NULL)
4181  {
4182  j = k = 0;
4183  while (chunk[j])
4184  {
4185  if (chunk[j] != '\"' && chunk[j] != '\'')
4186  {
4187  p_dec->sc_expr[1][i][k] = chunk[j];
4188  k++;
4189  }
4190  if (++j > NI_MAX_PPU_PARAM_EXPR_CHAR)
4191  {
4192  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
4193  }
4194  }
4195  chunk = strtok(NULL, xdelim);
4196  }
4197  else
4198  {
4199  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4200  }
4201  }
4202  }
4203  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_SCALE_2)
4204  {
4205  chunk = value;
4206  i = 0; // 'x' character counter
4207  while (*chunk++) {
4208  if (*chunk == xdelim[0]) {
4209  i++;
4210  }
4211  }
4212  if (i != 1) {
4213  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4214  }
4215  chunk = NULL;
4216 
4217  chunk = strtok(value, xdelim);
4218  for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
4219  {
4220  if (chunk != NULL)
4221  {
4222  j = k = 0;
4223  while (chunk[j])
4224  {
4225  if (chunk[j] != '\"' && chunk[j] != '\'')
4226  {
4227  p_dec->sc_expr[2][i][k] = chunk[j];
4228  k++;
4229  }
4230  if (++j > NI_MAX_PPU_PARAM_EXPR_CHAR)
4231  {
4232  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
4233  }
4234  }
4235  chunk = strtok(NULL, xdelim);
4236  }
4237  else
4238  {
4239  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4240  }
4241  }
4242  }
4243  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_MULTICORE_JOINT_MODE)
4244  {
4245  if ((atoi(value) != 0) && (atoi(value) != 1))
4246  {
4247  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4248  }
4249  p_dec->mcmode = atoi(value);
4250  }
4251  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_SAVE_PKT)
4252  {
4253  if (atoi(value) < 0)
4254  {
4255  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4256  }
4257  p_dec->nb_save_pkt = atoi(value);
4258  }
4259  OPT(NI_KEEP_ALIVE_TIMEOUT)
4260  {
4261  if ((atoi(value) < NI_MIN_KEEP_ALIVE_TIMEOUT) ||
4262  (atoi(value) > NI_MAX_KEEP_ALIVE_TIMEOUT))
4263  {
4264  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4265  }
4266  p_dec->keep_alive_timeout = atoi(value);
4267  }
4268  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_LOW_DELAY)
4269  {
4270  if (atoi(value) < 0)
4271  {
4272  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4273  }
4274  p_dec->decoder_low_delay = atoi(value);
4275  }
4276  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_ENABLE_USR_DATA_SEI_PASSTHRU)
4277  {
4278  if (atoi(value) != NI_ENABLE_USR_DATA_SEI_PASSTHRU &&
4279  atoi(value) != NI_DISABLE_USR_DATA_SEI_PASSTHRU)
4280  {
4281  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4282  }
4283  p_dec->enable_user_data_sei_passthru = atoi(value);
4284  }
4285  OPT(NI_DEC_PARAM_ENABLE_CUSTOM_SEI_PASSTHRU)
4286  {
4287  if (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_CUSTOM_SEI_PASSTHRU ||
4288  atoi(value) > NI_MAX_CUSTOM_SEI_PASSTHRU)
4289  {
4290  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4291  }
4292  p_dec->custom_sei_passthru = atoi(value);
4293  }
4294  else
4295  {
4296  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_NAME;
4297  }
4298 
4299 #undef OPT
4300 #undef atobool
4301 #undef atoi
4302 #undef atof
4303  b_error |= bValueWasNull && !bNameWasBool;
4304 
4305  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: exit, b_error=%d\n", __func__, b_error);
4306 
4307  return b_error ? NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE : NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4308 }
4309 
4310 #undef atoi
4311 #undef atof
4312 #define atoi(p_str) ni_atoi(p_str, &b_error)
4313 #define atof(p_str) ni_atof(p_str, &b_error)
4314 #define atobool(p_str) (ni_atobool(p_str, &b_error))
4315 
4316 /*!*****************************************************************************
4317  * \brief Set value referenced by name in encoder parameters structure
4318  *
4319  * \param[in] p_params Pointer to a user allocated ni_xcoder_params_t
4320  * to find and set a particular parameter
4321  * \param[in] name String represented parameter name to search
4322  * \param[in] value Parameter value to set
4323 *
4324  * \return On success
4325  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
4326  * On failure
4327  * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
4328  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
4329  ******************************************************************************/
4330 ni_retcode_t ni_encoder_params_set_value(ni_xcoder_params_t *p_params,
4331  const char *name, const char *value)
4332 {
4333  bool b_error = false;
4334  bool bNameWasBool = false;
4335  bool bValueWasNull = !value;
4336  ni_encoder_cfg_params_t *p_enc = &p_params->cfg_enc_params;
4337  char nameBuf[64] = { 0 };
4338  int i,j,k;
4339 
4340 
4341  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
4342 
4343  if (!p_params)
4344  {
4345  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null pointer parameters passed\n",
4346  __func__);
4347  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
4348  }
4349 
4350  if ( !name )
4351  {
4352  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null name pointer parameters passed\n",
4353  __func__);
4354  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_NAME;
4355  }
4356 
4357  // skip -- prefix if provided
4358  if (name[0] == '-' && name[1] == '-')
4359  {
4360  name += 2;
4361  }
4362 
4363  // s/_/-/g
4364  if (strlen(name) + 1 < sizeof(nameBuf) && strchr(name, '_'))
4365  {
4366  char* c;
4367  strcpy(nameBuf, name);
4368  while ((c = strchr(nameBuf, '_')) != 0)
4369  {
4370  *c = '-';
4371  }
4372 
4373  name = nameBuf;
4374  }
4375 
4376  if (!strncmp(name, "no-", 3))
4377  {
4378  name += 3;
4379  value = !value || ni_atobool(value, &b_error) ? "false" : "true";
4380  }
4381  else if (!strncmp(name, "no", 2))
4382  {
4383  name += 2;
4384  value = !value || ni_atobool(value, &b_error) ? "false" : "true";
4385  }
4386  else if (!value)
4387  {
4388  value = "true";
4389  }
4390  else if (value[0] == '=')
4391  {
4392  value++;
4393  }
4394 
4395 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
4396 #define OPT(STR) else if (!_stricmp(name, STR))
4397 #define OPT2(STR1, STR2) \
4398  else if (!_stricmp(name, STR1) || !_stricmp(name, STR2))
4399 #else
4400 #define OPT(STR) else if (!strcasecmp(name, STR))
4401 #define OPT2(STR1, STR2) else if (!strcasecmp(name, STR1) || !strcasecmp(name, STR2))
4402 #endif
4403 #define COMPARE(STR1, STR2, STR3) \
4404  if ((atoi(STR1) > (STR2)) || (atoi(STR1) < (STR3))) \
4405  { \
4406  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR; \
4407  }
4408  if (0)
4409  ;
4410  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_BITRATE )
4411  {
4412  if (AV_CODEC_DEFAULT_BITRATE == p_params->bitrate)
4413  {
4414  if (atoi(value) > NI_MAX_BITRATE)
4415  {
4416  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
4417  }
4418  if (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_BITRATE)
4419  {
4420  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_SMALL;
4421  }
4422  p_params->bitrate = atoi(value);
4423  }
4424  }
4425  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_RECONF_DEMO_MODE )
4426  {
4427  p_params->reconf_demo_mode = atoi(value); // NETINT_INTERNAL - currently only for internal testing
4428  }
4429  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_RECONF_FILE )
4430  {
4431  ni_retcode_t retval = ni_parse_reconf_file(value, p_params->reconf_hash);
4432  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS) // NETINT_INTERNAL - currently only for internal testing
4433  {
4434  return retval;
4435  }
4436  }
4437  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ROI_DEMO_MODE )
4438  {
4439  // NETINT_INTERNAL - currently only for internal testing
4440  p_params->roi_demo_mode = atoi(value);
4441  if ((p_params->roi_demo_mode < 0) || (p_params->roi_demo_mode > 2))
4442  {
4443  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4444  }
4445  }
4446  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_LOW_DELAY )
4447  {
4448  if (0 > atoi(value))
4449  {
4450  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4451  }
4452  p_params->low_delay_mode = atoi(value);
4453  }
4454  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_PADDING )
4455  {
4456  p_params->padding = atoi(value);
4457  }
4458  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_GEN_HDRS )
4459  {
4460  if (0 != atoi(value) && 1 != atoi(value))
4461  {
4462  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4463  }
4464  p_params->generate_enc_hdrs = atoi(value);
4465  }
4466  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_USE_LOW_DELAY_POC_TYPE)
4467  {
4468  if (0 != atoi(value) && 1 != atoi(value))
4469  {
4470  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4471  }
4472  p_params->use_low_delay_poc_type = atoi(value);
4473  }
4474  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_FORCE_FRAME_TYPE )
4475  {
4476  if (QUADRA)
4477  {
4478  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4479  }
4480  p_params->force_frame_type = atoi(value);
4481  }
4482  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_PROFILE )
4483  {
4484  p_enc->profile = atoi(value);
4485  }
4486  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LEVEL)
4487  {
4491  if (atof(value) <= 10)
4492  {
4493  p_enc->level_idc = (int)(10 * atof(value) + .5);
4494  }
4495  else
4496  {
4497  p_enc->level_idc = atoi(value);
4498  }
4499  }
4500  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_HIGH_TIER )
4501  {
4502  p_enc->high_tier = atobool(value);
4503  }
4504  OPT2( NI_ENC_PARAM_LOG_LEVEL, NI_ENC_PARAM_LOG )
4505  {
4506  p_params->log = atoi(value);
4507  if (b_error)
4508  {
4509  b_error = false;
4510  p_params->log = ni_parse_name(value, g_xcoder_log_names, &b_error) - 1;
4511  }
4512  }
4513  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_GOP_PRESET_IDX )
4514  {
4515  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_GOP_PRESET_IDX) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_GOP_PRESET_IDX))
4516  {
4517  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4518  }
4519  p_enc->gop_preset_index = atoi(value);
4520  }
4521  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_USE_RECOMMENDED_ENC_PARAMS )
4522  {
4523  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_USE_RECOMMENDED_ENC_PARAMS) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_USE_RECOMMENDED_ENC_PARAMS))
4524  {
4525  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4526  }
4527 
4528  p_enc->use_recommend_enc_params = atoi(value);
4529  }
4530  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_CU_SIZE_MODE )
4531  {
4532  if (QUADRA)
4533  {
4534  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4535  }
4536  if (((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_CU_SIZE_MODE) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_CU_SIZE_MODE)) && (atoi(value) != NI_DEFAULT_CU_SIZE_MODE))
4537  {
4538  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4539  }
4540 
4541  p_enc->cu_size_mode = atoi(value);
4542  }
4543  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_MAX_NUM_MERGE )
4544  {
4545  if (QUADRA)
4546  {
4547  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4548  }
4549  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_MAX_NUM_MERGE) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_MAX_NUM_MERGE))
4550  {
4551  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4552  }
4553 
4554  p_enc->max_num_merge = atoi(value);
4555  }
4556  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_8X8_MERGE )
4557  {
4558  if (QUADRA)
4559  {
4560  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4561  }
4562  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_DYNAMIC_MERGE) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_DYNAMIC_MERGE))
4563  {
4564  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4565  }
4566 
4567  p_enc->enable_dynamic_8x8_merge = atoi(value);
4568  }
4569  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_16X16_MERGE )
4570  {
4571  if (QUADRA)
4572  {
4573  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4574  }
4575  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_DYNAMIC_MERGE) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_DYNAMIC_MERGE))
4576  {
4577  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4578  }
4579 
4580  p_enc->enable_dynamic_16x16_merge = atoi(value);
4581  }
4582  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_32X32_MERGE )
4583  {
4584  if (QUADRA)
4585  {
4586  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4587  }
4588  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_DYNAMIC_MERGE) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_DYNAMIC_MERGE))
4589  {
4590  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4591  }
4592 
4593  p_enc->enable_dynamic_32x32_merge = atoi(value);
4594  }
4595  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_RATE_CONTROL )
4596  {
4597  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_BIN) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_BIN))
4598  {
4599  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4600  }
4601 
4602  p_enc->rc.enable_rate_control = atoi(value);
4603  }
4604  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_CU_LEVEL_RATE_CONTROL )
4605  {
4606  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_BIN) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_BIN))
4607  {
4608  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4609  }
4610 
4611  p_enc->rc.enable_cu_level_rate_control = atoi(value);
4612  }
4613  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_HVS_QP )
4614  {
4615  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_BIN) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_BIN))
4616  {
4617  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4618  }
4619  p_enc->rc.enable_hvs_qp = atoi(value);
4620  }
4621  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_HVS_QP_SCALE )
4622  {
4623  if (QUADRA)
4624  {
4625  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4626  }
4627  p_enc->rc.enable_hvs_qp_scale = atoi(value);
4628  }
4629  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_HVS_QP_SCALE )
4630  {
4631  p_enc->rc.hvs_qp_scale = atoi(value);
4632  }
4633  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_MIN_QP )
4634  {
4635  p_enc->rc.min_qp = atoi(value);
4636  }
4637  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_MAX_QP )
4638  {
4639  p_enc->rc.max_qp = atoi(value);
4640  }
4641  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_MAX_DELTA_QP )
4642  {
4643  if (QUADRA)
4644  {
4645  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4646  }
4647  p_enc->rc.max_delta_qp = atoi(value);
4648  }
4649  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_RC_INIT_DELAY )
4650  {
4651  p_enc->rc.vbv_buffer_size = atoi(value);
4652  if (QUADRA)
4653  {
4654  // RcInitDelay is deprecated and replaced with vbvBufferSize. But still accept the value.
4655  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4656  }
4657  }
4658  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_VBV_BUFFER_SIZE )
4659  {
4660  p_enc->rc.vbv_buffer_size = atoi(value);
4661  }
4662  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_CBR )
4663  {
4664  p_enc->rc.enable_filler = atoi(value);
4665  if (QUADRA)
4666  {
4667  // cbr is deprecated and replaced with fillerEnable. But still accept the value.
4668  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4669  }
4670  }
4671  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_FILLER )
4672  {
4673  p_enc->rc.enable_filler = atoi(value);
4674  }
4675  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_PIC_SKIP )
4676  {
4677  if (0 != atoi(value) && 1 != atoi(value))
4678  {
4679  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4680  }
4681  // Currenly pic skip is supported for low delay gops only - pic skip issues tracked by QDFW-1785/1958
4682  p_enc->rc.enable_pic_skip = atoi(value);
4683  }
4684  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_MAX_FRAME_SIZE_LOW_DELAY)
4685  {
4686  if (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_FRAME_SIZE)
4687  {
4688  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4689  }
4690  p_enc->maxFrameSize = (atoi(value) > NI_MAX_FRAME_SIZE) ? NI_MAX_FRAME_SIZE : atoi(value);
4691  }
4692  OPT ( NI_ENC_PARAM_FORCED_HEADER_ENABLE )

4695  {
4696  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4697  }
4698  p_enc->forced_header_enable = atoi(value);
4699  }

4703  }

4707  }

4709  {

4711  }

4720  OPT2(NI_ENC_PARAM_INTRA_PERIOD, NI_ENC_PARAM_INTRA_REFRESH_MIN_PERIOD)
4721  {

4723  //p_enc->bitrateWindow = p_enc->intra_period;
4724  }
4725  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_TRANS_RATE )
4726  {

4728  {
4729  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
4730  }
4731  if (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_BITRATE)
4732  {
4733  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_SMALL;
4734  }
4735  p_enc->rc.trans_rate = atoi(value);
4736  }
4737  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_FRAME_RATE )
4738  {
4739  if (atoi(value) <= 0 )
4740  {
4741  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_ZERO;
4742  }
4743  p_params->fps_number = atoi(value);
4744  p_params->fps_denominator = 1;
4745  p_enc->frame_rate = p_params->fps_number;
4746  }
4747  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_FRAME_RATE_DENOM )
4748  {
4749  if (atoi(value) <= 0)
4750  {
4751  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_ZERO;
4752  }
4753  p_params->fps_denominator = atoi(value);
4754  p_enc->frame_rate = (int)(p_params->fps_number / p_params->fps_denominator);
4755  }
4756  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_INTRA_QP )
4757  {
4758  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_INTRA_QP) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_INTRA_QP))
4759  {
4760  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4761  }
4762

4764  }

4774  }

4780  }

4790  {

4794  }

4800  }
4801  p_enc->intra_reset_refresh = atoi(value);
4802  }
4803 // Rev. B: H.264 only parameters.
4804  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_8X8_TRANSFORM )
4805  {
