4829  }
4830  p_enc->entropy_coding_mode = atoi(value);
4831  }
4832 // Rev. B: shared between HEVC and H.264
4833  OPT2(NI_ENC_PARAM_INTRA_MB_REFRESH_MODE, NI_ENC_PARAM_INTRA_REFRESH_MODE)
4834  {
4835  p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_mode = atoi(value);
4836  }
4837  OPT2(NI_ENC_PARAM_INTRA_MB_REFRESH_ARG, NI_ENC_PARAM_INTRA_REFRESH_ARG)
4838  {
4839  p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_arg = atoi(value);
4840  }
4841 // TBD Rev. B: could be shared for HEVC and H.264
4842  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_MB_LEVEL_RC )
4843  {
4844  if ((atoi(value) > NI_MAX_BIN) || (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_BIN))
4845  {
4846  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4847  }
4848  p_enc->rc.enable_mb_level_rc = atoi(value);
4849  if (QUADRA)
4850  {
4851  // mbLevelRcEnable will be deprecated and cuLevelRCEnable should be used instead. But still accept the value.
4852  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
4853  }
4854  }
4855  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_PREFERRED_TRANSFER_CHARACTERISTICS)
4856  {
4857  if ((atoi(value) > 255) || (atoi(value) < 0))
4858  {
4859  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4860  }
4861  p_enc->preferred_transfer_characteristics = atoi(value);
4862  }
4863  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_DOLBY_VISION_PROFILE)
4864  {
4865  if (atoi(value) != 0 && atoi(value) != 5)
4866  {
4867  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4868  }
4869  p_params->dolby_vision_profile = atoi(value);
4870  }
4871  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_CONSTANT_RATE_FACTOR)
4872  {
4873  if ((atoi(value) > 51) || (atoi(value) < -1))
4874  {
4875  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4876  }
4877  p_enc->crf = atoi(value);
4878  }
4879  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_RDO_LEVEL)
4880  {
4881  if ((atoi(value) > 3) || (atoi(value) < 1))
4882  {
4883  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4884  }
4885  p_enc->rdoLevel = atoi(value);
4886  }
4887  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_MAX_CLL)
4888  {
4889  const char delim[2] = ",";
4890  char *chunk;
4891 #ifdef _MSC_VER
4892  char *v = _strdup(value);
4893 #else
4894  char *v = strdup(value);
4895 #endif
4896  chunk = strtok(v, delim);
4897  if (chunk != NULL)
4898  {
4899  if ((atoi(chunk) > 65535) || (atoi(chunk) < 0))
4900  {
4901  free(v);
4902  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4903  }
4904  p_enc->HDR10MaxLight = atoi(chunk);
4905  chunk = strtok(NULL, delim);
4906  if (chunk != NULL)
4907  {
4908  if ((atoi(chunk) > 65535) || (atoi(chunk) < 0))
4909  {
4910  free(v);
4911  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
4912  }
4913  p_enc->HDR10AveLight = atoi(chunk);
4914  p_enc->HDR10CLLEnable = 1; //Both param populated so enable
4915  free(v);
4916  }
4917  else
4918  {
4919  free(v);
4920  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4921  }
4922  }
4923  else
4924  {
4925  free(v);
4926  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
4927  }
4928  }
4929 
4930  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_MASTER_DISPLAY)
4931  {
4932 #ifdef _MSC_VER
4933 #define STRDUP(value) _strdup(value);
4934 #else
4935 #define STRDUP(value) strdup(value);
4936 #endif
4937  const char G[2] = "G";
4938  const char B[2] = "B";
4939  const char R[2] = "R";
4940  const char W[2] = "W";
4941  const char L[2] = "L";
4942  const char P[2] = "P";
4943  const char parL[2] = "(";
4944  const char comma[2] = ",";
4945  const char parR[2] = ")";
4946  int synCheck_GBRWLPCP[8];
4947  int posCheck_GBRWL[5];
4948  char *chunk;//for parsing out more complex inputs
4949  char *subchunk;
4950  char *v = STRDUP(value);
4951  //basic check syntax correct
4952  for (i = 0; i<8; i++)
4953  {
4954  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[i] = 0;
4955  }
4956  chunk = v;
4957  i = 0; // character index
4958 
4959  //count keys and punctuation, save indicies to be parsed
4960  while (*chunk) {
4961  if (*chunk == G[0])
4962  {
4963  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[0]++;
4964  posCheck_GBRWL[0] = i;
4965  }
4966  else if (*chunk == B[0])
4967  {
4968  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[1]++;
4969  posCheck_GBRWL[1] = i;
4970  }
4971  else if (*chunk == R[0])
4972  {
4973  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[2]++;
4974  posCheck_GBRWL[2] = i;
4975  }
4976  else if (*chunk == W[0])
4977  {
4978  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[3]++;
4979  posCheck_GBRWL[3] = i;
4980  }
4981  else if (*chunk == L[0])
4982  {
4983  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[4]++;
4984  posCheck_GBRWL[4] = i;
4985  }
4986  else if (*chunk == parL[0])
4987  {
4988  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[5]++;
4989  }
4990  else if (*chunk == comma[0])
4991  {
4992  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[6]++;
4993  }
4994  else if (*chunk == parR[0])
4995  {
4996  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[7]++;
4997  }
4998  chunk++;
4999  i++;
5000  }
5001  free(v);
5002  if (synCheck_GBRWLPCP[0] != 1 || synCheck_GBRWLPCP[1] != 1 || synCheck_GBRWLPCP[2] != 1 ||
5003  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[3] != 1 || synCheck_GBRWLPCP[4] != 1 || synCheck_GBRWLPCP[5] != 5 ||
5004  synCheck_GBRWLPCP[6] != 5 || synCheck_GBRWLPCP[7] != 5)
5005  {
5006  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
5007  }
5008 
5009  //Parse a key-value set like G(%hu, %hu)
5010 #define GBRWLPARSE(OUT1,OUT2,OFF,IDX) \
5011 { \
5012  char *v = STRDUP(value); \
5013  chunk = v + posCheck_GBRWL[IDX]; \
5014  i = j = k = 0; \
5015  while (chunk != NULL) \
5016  { \
5017  if (*chunk == parL[0] && i == 1+(OFF)) \
5018  { \
5019  j = 1; \
5020  } \
5021  if((OFF) == 1 && *chunk != P[0] && i == 1) \
5022  { \
5023  break; \
5024  } \
5025  if (*chunk == parR[0]) \
5026  { \
5027  k = 1; \
5028  break; \
5029  } \
5030  i++; \
5031  chunk++; \
5032  } \
5033  if (!j || !k) \
5034  { \
5035  free(v); \
5036  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE; \
5037  } \
5038  subchunk = malloc(i - 2 - (OFF)); \
5039  if (subchunk == NULL) \
5040  { \
5041  free(v); \
5042  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC; \
5043  } \
5044  memcpy(subchunk, v + posCheck_GBRWL[IDX] + 2 + (OFF), i - 2 - (OFF)); \
5045  chunk = strtok(subchunk, comma); \
5046  if (chunk != NULL) \
5047  { \
5048  if(atoi(chunk) < 0) \
5049  { \
5050  free(v); \
5051  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE; \
5052  } \
5053  *(OUT1) = atoi(chunk); \
5054  chunk = strtok(NULL, comma); \
5055  if(atoi(chunk) < 0) \
5056  { \
5057  free(v); \
5058  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE; \
5059  } \
5060  *(OUT2) = atoi(chunk); \
5061  } \
5062  free(subchunk); \
5063  free(v); \
5064 }
5065  GBRWLPARSE(&p_enc->HDR10dx0, &p_enc->HDR10dy0, 0, 0);
5066  GBRWLPARSE(&p_enc->HDR10dx1, &p_enc->HDR10dy1, 0, 1);
5067  GBRWLPARSE(&p_enc->HDR10dx2, &p_enc->HDR10dy2, 0, 2);
5068  GBRWLPARSE(&p_enc->HDR10wx, &p_enc->HDR10wy, 1, 3);
5069  GBRWLPARSE(&p_enc->HDR10maxluma, &p_enc->HDR10minluma, 0, 4);
5070  p_enc->HDR10Enable = 1;
5071  }
5072  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LOOK_AHEAD_DEPTH)
5073  {
5074  if (atoi(value)!= 0 && ((atoi(value) > 40 ) || (atoi(value) < 4)))
5075  {
5076  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5077  }
5078  p_enc->lookAheadDepth = atoi(value);
5079  }
5080  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_HRD_ENABLE)
5081  {
5082  if (atoi(value) != 0 && atoi(value) != 1)
5083  {
5084  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5085  }
5086  p_enc->hrdEnable = atoi(value);
5087  }
5088  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_AUD)
5089  {
5090  if ((atoi(value) != 0) && (atoi(value) != 1))
5091  {
5092  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5093  }
5094  p_enc->EnableAUD = atoi(value);
5095  }
5096  OPT( NI_ENC_PARAM_CACHE_ROI )
5097  {
5098  if (atoi(value) != 0 && atoi(value) != 1)
5099  {
5100  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5101  }
5102  p_params->cacheRoi = atoi(value);
5103  }
5104  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LONG_TERM_REFERENCE_ENABLE)
5105  {
5106  if (atoi(value) != 0 && atoi(value) != 1)
5107  {
5108  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5109  }
5110  p_enc->long_term_ref_enable = atoi(value);
5111  }
5112  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LONG_TERM_REFERENCE_INTERVAL)
5113  {
5114  p_enc->long_term_ref_interval = atoi(value);
5115  }
5116  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LONG_TERM_REFERENCE_COUNT)
5117  {
5118  if (atoi(value) < 1 || atoi(value) > 2)
5119  {
5120  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5121  }
5122  p_enc->long_term_ref_count = atoi(value);
5123  }
5124  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_RDO_QUANT)
5125  {
5126  if ((atoi(value) != 0) && (atoi(value) != 1))
5127  {
5128  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5129  }
5130  p_enc->EnableRdoQuant = atoi(value);
5131  }
5132  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_CTB_RC_MODE)
5133  {
5134  if (QUADRA)
5135  {
5136  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
5137  }
5138 
5139  if ((atoi(value) < 0) || (atoi(value) > 3))
5140  {
5141  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5142  }
5143  p_enc->ctbRcMode = atoi(value);
5144  }
5145  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_GOP_SIZE)
5146  {
5147  if (QUADRA)
5148  {
5149  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
5150  }
5151 
5152  p_enc->gopSize = atoi(value);
5153  }
5154  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_GOP_LOW_DELAY)
5155  {
5156  if (QUADRA)
5157  {
5158  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
5159  }

5162  {
5163  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5164  }

5168  {

5170  {
5171  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARNING_DEPRECATED;
5172  }
5173  p_enc->gdrDuration = atoi(value);
5174  }
5175  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LTR_REF_INTERVAL)
5176  {
5177  p_enc->ltrRefInterval = atoi(value);
5178  }
5179  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LTR_REF_QPOFFSET)
5180  {
5181  p_enc->ltrRefQpOffset = atoi(value);
5182  }
5183  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LTR_FIRST_GAP)
5184  {
5185  p_enc->ltrFirstGap = atoi(value);
5186  }
5187  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_LTR_NEXT_INTERVAL) { p_enc->ltrNextInterval = atoi(value); }
5188  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_MULTICORE_JOINT_MODE)
5189  {
5190  if ((atoi(value) != 0) && (atoi(value) != 1))
5191  {

5193  }
5194  p_enc->multicoreJointMode = atoi(value);
5195  }
5196  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_JPEG_QLEVEL)
5197  {

5199  {

5201  }
5202  p_enc->qlevel = atoi(value);
5203  }
5204  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_CHROMA_QP_OFFSET)
5205  {
5206  if ((atoi(value) > 12) || (atoi(value) < -12))
5207  {
5208  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5209  }
5210  p_enc->chromaQpOffset = atoi(value);
5211  }
5212  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_TOL_RC_INTER) { p_enc->tolCtbRcInter = (float)atof(value); }
5213  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_TOL_RC_INTRA) { p_enc->tolCtbRcIntra = (float)atof(value); }
5214  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_BITRATE_WINDOW)
5215  {
5216  if ((atoi(value) > 300) || (atoi(value) < 1))
5217  {
5218  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5219  }
5220  p_enc->bitrateWindow = atoi(value);
5221  }
5222  OPT(NI_ENC_BLOCK_RC_SIZE)
5223  {
5224  if ((atoi(value) > 2) || (atoi(value) < 0))
5225  {
5226  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5227  }
5228  p_enc->blockRCSize = atoi(value);
5229  }
5230  OPT(NI_ENC_RC_QP_DELTA_RANGE)
5231  {
5232  if ((atoi(value) > 15) || (atoi(value) < 0))
5233  {
5234  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5235  }
5236  p_enc->rcQpDeltaRange = atoi(value);
5237  }
5238  OPT(NI_ENC_INLOOP_DS_RATIO)
5239  {
5240  if ((atoi(value) > 1) || (atoi(value) < 0))
5241  {
5242  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5243  }
5244  p_enc->inLoopDSRatio = atoi(value);
5245  }
5246  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_COLOR_PRIMARY)
5247  {
5248  COMPARE(value, 22, 0)
5249  p_params->color_primaries = atoi(value);
5250  }
5251  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_COLOR_TRANSFER_CHARACTERISTIC)
5252  {
5253  COMPARE(value, 18, 0)
5254  p_params->color_transfer_characteristic = atoi(value);
5255  }
5256  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_COLOR_SPACE)
5257  {
5258  COMPARE(value, 14, 0)
5259  p_params->color_space = atoi(value);
5260  }
5261  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_SAR_NUM) { p_params->sar_num = atoi(value); }
5262  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_SAR_DENOM) { p_params->sar_denom = atoi(value); }
5263  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_VIDEO_FULL_RANGE_FLAG)
5264  {
5265  p_params->video_full_range_flag = atoi(value);
5266  }
5267  OPT(NI_KEEP_ALIVE_TIMEOUT)
5268  {
5269  if ((atoi(value) < NI_MIN_KEEP_ALIVE_TIMEOUT) ||
5270  (atoi(value) > NI_MAX_KEEP_ALIVE_TIMEOUT))
5271  {
5272  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5273  }
5274  p_enc->keep_alive_timeout = atoi(value);
5275  }
5276  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_ENABLE_VFR)
5277  {
5278  if (atoi(value) != 0 && atoi(value) != 1)
5279  {
5280  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5281  }
5282  p_params->enable_vfr = atoi(value);
5283  }
5284  OPT(NI_ENC_ENABLE_SSIM)
5285  {
5286  if ((atoi(value) != 0) && (atoi(value) != 1))
5287  {
5288  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5289  }
5290  p_enc->enable_ssim = atoi(value);
5291  }
5292  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_AV1_ERROR_RESILIENT_MODE)
5293  {
5294  if ((atoi(value) != 0) && (atoi(value) != 1))
5295  {
5296  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5297  }
5298  p_enc->av1_error_resilient_mode = atoi(value);
5299  }
5300  OPT(NI_ENC_PARAM_STATIC_MMAP_THRESHOLD)
5301  {
5302  if ((atoi(value) != 0) && (atoi(value) != 1))
5303  {
5304  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
5305  }
5306  p_params->staticMmapThreshold = atoi(value);
5307  }
5308  else { return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_NAME; }
5309 
5310 #undef OPT
5311 #undef OPT2
5312 #undef atobool
5313 #undef atoi
5314 #undef atof
5315 
5316  b_error |= bValueWasNull && !bNameWasBool;
5317 
5318  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s: exit, b_error=%d\n", __func__, b_error);
5319 
5320  return b_error ? NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE : NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5321 }
5322 
5323 #undef atoi
5324 #undef atof
5325 #define atoi(p_str) ni_atoi(p_str, &b_error)
5326 #define atof(p_str) ni_atof(p_str, &b_error)
5327 #define atobool(p_str) (ni_atobool(p_str, &b_error))
5328 
5329 /*!*****************************************************************************
5330  * \brief Set GOP parameter value referenced by name in encoder parameters
5331  * structure
5332  *
5333  * \param[in] p_params Pointer to a user allocated ni_xcoder_params_t
5334  * to find and set a particular parameter
5335  * \param[in] name String represented parameter name to search
5336  * \param[in] value Parameter value to set
5337 *
5338  * \return On success
5339  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
5340  * On failure
5341  * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
5342  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
5343  ******************************************************************************/
5344 ni_retcode_t ni_encoder_gop_params_set_value(ni_xcoder_params_t *p_params,
5345  const char *name,
5346  const char *value)
5347 {
5348  bool b_error = false;
5349  bool bNameWasBool = false;
5350  bool bValueWasNull = !value;
5351  ni_encoder_cfg_params_t *p_enc = &p_params->cfg_enc_params;
5352  ni_custom_gop_params_t* p_gop = &p_enc->custom_gop_params;
5353 
5354  char nameBuf[64] = { 0 };
5355 
5356  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5357 
5358  if (!p_params)
5359  {
5360  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null pointer parameters passed\n",
5361  __func__);
5362  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5363  }
5364 
5365  if ( !name )
5366  {
5367  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null name pointer parameters passed\n",
5368  __func__);
5369  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_NAME;
5370  }
5371 
5372  // skip -- prefix if provided
5373  if ((name[0] == '-') && (name[1] == '-'))
5374  {
5375  name += 2;
5376  }
5377 
5378  // s/_/-/g
5379  if (strlen(name) + 1 < sizeof(nameBuf) && strchr(name, '_'))
5380  {
5381  char* c;
5382  strcpy(nameBuf, name);
5383  while ((c = strchr(nameBuf, '_')) != 0)
5384  {
5385  *c = '-';
5386  }
5387 
5388  name = nameBuf;
5389  }
5390 
5391  if (!strncmp(name, "no-", 3))
5392  {
5393  name += 3;
5394  value = !value || ni_atobool(value, &b_error) ? "false" : "true";
5395  }
5396  else if (!strncmp(name, "no", 2))
5397  {
5398  name += 2;
5399  value = !value || ni_atobool(value, &b_error) ? "false" : "true";
5400  }
5401  else if (!value)
5402  {
5403  value = "true";
5404  }
5405  else if (value[0] == '=')
5406  {
5407  value++;
5408  }
5409 
5410 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
5411 #define OPT(STR) else if (!_stricmp(name, STR))
5412 #else
5413 #define OPT(STR) else if (!strcasecmp(name, STR))
5414 #endif
5415  if (0)
5416  ;
5417  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_CUSTOM_GOP_SIZE)
5418  {
5419  if (atoi(value) > NI_MAX_GOP_SIZE)
5420  {
5421  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_BIG;
5422  }
5423  if (atoi(value) < NI_MIN_GOP_SIZE)
5424  {
5425  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_SMALL;
5426  }
5427  p_gop->custom_gop_size = atoi(value);
5428  }
5429 
5430 #ifndef QUADRA
5431  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_PIC_TYPE)
5432  {
5433  p_gop->pic_param[0].pic_type = atoi(value);
5434  }
5435  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_POC_OFFSET)
5436  {
5437  p_gop->pic_param[0].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5438  }
5439  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_PIC_QP)
5440  {
5441  p_gop->pic_param[0].pic_qp = atoi(value);
5442  }
5443  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC_L0)
5444  {
5445  p_gop->pic_param[0].num_ref_pic_L0 = atoi(value);
5446  }
5447  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_POC_L0)
5448  {
5449  p_gop->pic_param[0].ref_poc_L0 = atoi(value);
5450  }
5451  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_POC_L1)
5452  {
5453  p_gop->pic_param[0].ref_poc_L1 = atoi(value);
5454  }
5455  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_TEMPORAL_ID)
5456  {
5457  p_gop->pic_param[0].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5458  }
5459 
5460  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_PIC_TYPE)
5461  {
5462  p_gop->pic_param[1].pic_type = atoi(value);
5463  }
5464  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_POC_OFFSET)
5465  {
5466  p_gop->pic_param[1].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5467  }
5468  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_PIC_QP)
5469  {
5470  p_gop->pic_param[1].pic_qp = atoi(value);
5471  }
5472  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC_L0)
5473  {
5474  p_gop->pic_param[1].num_ref_pic_L0 = atoi(value);
5475  }
5476  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_POC_L0)
5477  {
5478  p_gop->pic_param[1].ref_poc_L0 = atoi(value);
5479  }
5480  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_POC_L1)
5481  {
5482  p_gop->pic_param[1].ref_poc_L1 = atoi(value);
5483  }
5484  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_TEMPORAL_ID)
5485  {
5486  p_gop->pic_param[1].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5487  }
5488 
5489  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_PIC_TYPE)
5490  {
5491  p_gop->pic_param[2].pic_type = atoi(value);
5492  }
5493  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_POC_OFFSET)
5494  {
5495  p_gop->pic_param[2].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5496  }
5497  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_PIC_QP)
5498  {
5499  p_gop->pic_param[2].pic_qp = atoi(value);
5500  }
5501  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC_L0)
5502  {
5503  p_gop->pic_param[2].num_ref_pic_L0 = atoi(value);
5504  }
5505  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_POC_L0)
5506  {
5507  p_gop->pic_param[2].ref_poc_L0 = atoi(value);
5508  }
5509  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_POC_L1)
5510  {
5511  p_gop->pic_param[2].ref_poc_L1 = atoi(value);
5512  }
5513  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_TEMPORAL_ID)
5514  {
5515  p_gop->pic_param[2].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5516  }
5517 
5518  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_PIC_TYPE)
5519  {
5520  p_gop->pic_param[3].pic_type = atoi(value);
5521  }
5522  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_POC_OFFSET)
5523  {
5524  p_gop->pic_param[3].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5525  }
5526  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_PIC_QP)
5527  {
5528  p_gop->pic_param[3].pic_qp = atoi(value);
5529  }
5530  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_NUM_REF_PIC_L0)
5531  {
5532  p_gop->pic_param[3].num_ref_pic_L0 = atoi(value);
5533  }
5534  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_NUM_REF_POC_L0)
5535  {
5536  p_gop->pic_param[3].ref_poc_L0 = atoi(value);
5537  }
5538  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_NUM_REF_POC_L1)
5539  {
5540  p_gop->pic_param[3].ref_poc_L1 = atoi(value);
5541  }
5542  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_TEMPORAL_ID)
5543  {
5544  p_gop->pic_param[3].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5545  }
5546 
5547  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_PIC_TYPE)
5548  {
5549  p_gop->pic_param[4].pic_type = atoi(value);
5550  }
5551  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_POC_OFFSET)
5552  {
5553  p_gop->pic_param[4].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5554  }
5555  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_PIC_QP)
5556  {
5557  p_gop->pic_param[4].pic_qp = atoi(value);
5558  }
5559  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC_L0)
5560  {
5561  p_gop->pic_param[4].num_ref_pic_L0 = atoi(value);
5562  }
5563  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_POC_L0)
5564  {
5565  p_gop->pic_param[4].ref_poc_L0 = atoi(value);
5566  }
5567  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_POC_L1)
5568  {
5569  p_gop->pic_param[4].ref_poc_L1 = atoi(value);
5570  }
5571  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_TEMPORAL_ID)
5572  {
5573  p_gop->pic_param[4].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5574  }
5575 
5576  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_PIC_TYPE)
5577  {
5578  p_gop->pic_param[5].pic_type = atoi(value);
5579  }
5580  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_POC_OFFSET)
5581  {
5582  p_gop->pic_param[5].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5583  }
5584  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_PIC_QP)
5585  {
5586  p_gop->pic_param[5].pic_qp = atoi(value);
5587  }
5588  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC_L0)
5589  {
5590  p_gop->pic_param[5].num_ref_pic_L0 = atoi(value);
5591  }
5592  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_POC_L0)
5593  {
5594  p_gop->pic_param[5].ref_poc_L0 = atoi(value);
5595  }
5596  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_POC_L1)
5597  {
5598  p_gop->pic_param[5].ref_poc_L1 = atoi(value);
5599  }
5600  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_TEMPORAL_ID)
5601  {
5602  p_gop->pic_param[5].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5603  }
5604 
5605  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_PIC_TYPE)
5606  {
5607  p_gop->pic_param[6].pic_type = atoi(value);
5608  }
5609  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_POC_OFFSET)
5610  {
5611  p_gop->pic_param[6].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5612  }
5613  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_PIC_QP)
5614  {
5615  p_gop->pic_param[6].pic_qp = atoi(value);
5616  }
5617  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_PIC_L0)
5618  {
5619  p_gop->pic_param[6].num_ref_pic_L0 = atoi(value);
5620  }
5621  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_POC_L0)
5622  {
5623  p_gop->pic_param[6].ref_poc_L0 = atoi(value);
5624  }
5625  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_POC_L1)
5626  {
5627  p_gop->pic_param[6].ref_poc_L1 = atoi(value);
5628  }
5629  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_TEMPORAL_ID)
5630  {
5631  p_gop->pic_param[6].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5632  }
5633 
5634  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_PIC_TYPE)
5635  {
5636  p_gop->pic_param[7].pic_type = atoi(value);
5637  }
5638  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_POC_OFFSET)
5639  {
5640  p_gop->pic_param[7].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5641  }
5642  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_PIC_QP)
5643  {
5644  p_gop->pic_param[7].pic_qp = atoi(value);
5645  }
5646  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC_L0)
5647  {
5648  p_gop->pic_param[7].num_ref_pic_L0 = atoi(value);
5649  }
5650  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_POC_L0)
5651  {
5652  p_gop->pic_param[7].ref_poc_L0 = atoi(value);
5653  }
5654  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_POC_L1)
5655  {
5656  p_gop->pic_param[7].ref_poc_L1 = atoi(value);
5657  }
5658  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_TEMPORAL_ID)
5659  {
5660  p_gop->pic_param[7].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5661  }
5662  else
5663  {
5664  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): Invalid parameter name passed\n", __func__);
5665  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_NAME;
5666  }
5667 #else
5668  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_POC_OFFSET)
5669  {
5670  p_gop->pic_param[0].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5671  }
5672  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_QP_OFFSET)
5673  {
5674  p_gop->pic_param[0].qp_offset = atoi(value);
5675  }
5676  /*
5677  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_QP_FACTOR)
5678  {
5679  p_gop->pic_param[0].qp_factor = atof(value);
5680  }
5681  */
5682  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_TEMPORAL_ID)
5683  {
5684  p_gop->pic_param[0].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5685  }
5686  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_PIC_TYPE)
5687  {
5688  p_gop->pic_param[0].pic_type = atoi(value);
5689  }
5690  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PICS)
5691  {
5692  p_gop->pic_param[0].num_ref_pics = atoi(value);
5693  //ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): Frame1 num_ref_pics %d\n", __func__, p_gop->pic_param[0].num_ref_pics);
5694  }
5695  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC0)
5696  {
5697  p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[0].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5698  //ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): Frame1 %d rps[0].ref_pic %d\n", __func__, p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[0].ref_pic);
5699  }
5700  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC0_USED)
5701  {
5702  p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[0].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5703  //ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): Frame1 %d rps[0].ref_pic_used %d\n", __func__, p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[0].ref_pic_used);
5704  }
5705  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC1)
5706  {
5707  p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[1].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5708  }
5709  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC1_USED)
5710  {
5711  p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[1].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5712  }
5713  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC2)
5714  {
5715  p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[2].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5716  }
5717  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC2_USED)
5718  {
5719  p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[2].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5720  }
5721  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC3)
5722  {
5723  p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[3].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5724  }
5725  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G0_NUM_REF_PIC3_USED)
5726  {
5727  p_gop->pic_param[0].rps[3].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5728  }
5729 
5730  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_POC_OFFSET)
5731  {
5732  p_gop->pic_param[1].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5733  }
5734  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_QP_OFFSET)
5735  {
5736  p_gop->pic_param[1].qp_offset = atoi(value);
5737  }
5738  /*
5739  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_QP_FACTOR)
5740  {
5741  p_gop->pic_param[1].qp_factor = atof(value);
5742  }
5743  */
5744  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_TEMPORAL_ID)
5745  {
5746  p_gop->pic_param[1].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5747  }
5748  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_PIC_TYPE)
5749  {
5750  p_gop->pic_param[1].pic_type = atoi(value);
5751  }
5752  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PICS)
5753  {
5754  p_gop->pic_param[1].num_ref_pics = atoi(value);
5755  }
5756  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC0)
5757  {
5758  p_gop->pic_param[1].rps[0].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5759  }
5760  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC0_USED)
5761  {
5762  p_gop->pic_param[1].rps[0].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5763  }
5764  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC1)
5765  {
5766  p_gop->pic_param[1].rps[1].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5767  }
5768  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC1_USED)
5769  {
5770  p_gop->pic_param[1].rps[1].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5771  }
5772  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC2)
5773  {
5774  p_gop->pic_param[1].rps[2].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5775  }
5776  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC2_USED)
5777  {
5778  p_gop->pic_param[1].rps[2].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5779  }
5780  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC3)
5781  {
5782  p_gop->pic_param[1].rps[3].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5783  }
5784  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G1_NUM_REF_PIC3_USED)
5785  {
5786  p_gop->pic_param[1].rps[3].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5787  }
5788 
5789  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_POC_OFFSET)
5790  {
5791  p_gop->pic_param[2].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5792  }
5793  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_QP_OFFSET)
5794  {
5795  p_gop->pic_param[2].qp_offset = atoi(value);
5796  }
5797  /*
5798  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_QP_FACTOR)
5799  {
5800  p_gop->pic_param[2].qp_factor = atof(value);
5801  }
5802  */
5803  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_TEMPORAL_ID)
5804  {
5805  p_gop->pic_param[2].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5806  }
5807  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_PIC_TYPE)
5808  {
5809  p_gop->pic_param[2].pic_type = atoi(value);
5810  }
5811  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PICS)
5812  {
5813  p_gop->pic_param[2].num_ref_pics = atoi(value);
5814  }
5815  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC0)
5816  {
5817  p_gop->pic_param[2].rps[0].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5818  }
5819  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC0_USED)
5820  {
5821  p_gop->pic_param[2].rps[0].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5822  }
5823  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC1)
5824  {
5825  p_gop->pic_param[2].rps[1].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5826  }
5827  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC1_USED)
5828  {
5829  p_gop->pic_param[2].rps[1].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5830  }
5831  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC2)
5832  {
5833  p_gop->pic_param[2].rps[2].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5834  }
5835  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC2_USED)
5836  {
5837  p_gop->pic_param[2].rps[2].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5838  }
5839  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC3)
5840  {
5841  p_gop->pic_param[2].rps[3].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5842  }
5843  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G2_NUM_REF_PIC3_USED)
5844  {
5845  p_gop->pic_param[2].rps[3].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5846  }
5847 
5848  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_POC_OFFSET)
5849  {
5850  p_gop->pic_param[3].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5851  }
5852  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_QP_OFFSET)
5853  {
5854  p_gop->pic_param[3].qp_offset = atoi(value);
5855  }
5856  /*
5857  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_QP_FACTOR)
5858  {

5860  }
5861  */
5862  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_TEMPORAL_ID)
5863  {

5873  }

5875  {

5877  }
5878  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_NUM_REF_PIC0_USED)
5879  {

5881  }
5882  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_NUM_REF_PIC1)

5885  }

5889  }

5893  }

5895  {

5897  }
5898  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_NUM_REF_PIC3)

5901  }
5902  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G3_NUM_REF_PIC3_USED)
5903  {
5904  p_gop->pic_param[3].rps[3].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5905  }
5906 
5907  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_POC_OFFSET)
5908  {
5909  p_gop->pic_param[4].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5910  }

5920  */

5924  }
5925  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_PIC_TYPE)
5926  {
5927  p_gop->pic_param[4].pic_type = atoi(value);
5928  }
5929  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PICS)
5930  {
5931  p_gop->pic_param[4].num_ref_pics = atoi(value);
5932  }
5933  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC0)
5934  {
5935  p_gop->pic_param[4].rps[0].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5936  }
5937  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC0_USED)
5938  {
5939  p_gop->pic_param[4].rps[0].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5940  }
5941  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC1)
5942  {
5943  p_gop->pic_param[4].rps[1].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5944  }
5945  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC1_USED)
5946  {
5947  p_gop->pic_param[4].rps[1].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5948  }
5949  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC2)
5950  {
5951  p_gop->pic_param[4].rps[2].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5952  }
5953  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC2_USED)
5954  {
5955  p_gop->pic_param[4].rps[2].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5956  }
5957  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC3)
5958  {
5959  p_gop->pic_param[4].rps[3].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5960  }
5961  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G4_NUM_REF_PIC3_USED)
5962  {
5963  p_gop->pic_param[4].rps[3].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5964  }
5965 
5966  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_POC_OFFSET)
5967  {
5968  p_gop->pic_param[5].poc_offset = atoi(value);
5969  }
5970  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_QP_OFFSET)
5971  {
5972  p_gop->pic_param[5].qp_offset = atoi(value);
5973  }
5974  /*
5975  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_QP_FACTOR)
5976  {
5977  p_gop->pic_param[5].qp_factor = atof(value);
5978  }
5979  */
5980  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_TEMPORAL_ID)
5981  {
5982  p_gop->pic_param[5].temporal_id = atoi(value);
5983  }
5984  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_PIC_TYPE)
5985  {
5986  p_gop->pic_param[5].pic_type = atoi(value);
5987  }
5988  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PICS)
5989  {
5990  p_gop->pic_param[5].num_ref_pics = atoi(value);
5991  }
5992  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC0)
5993  {
5994  p_gop->pic_param[5].rps[0].ref_pic = atoi(value);
5995  }
5996  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC0_USED)
5997  {
5998  p_gop->pic_param[5].rps[0].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
5999  }
6000  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC1)
6001  {
6002  p_gop->pic_param[5].rps[1].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6003  }
6004  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC1_USED)
6005  {
6006  p_gop->pic_param[5].rps[1].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6007  }
6008  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC2)
6009  {
6010  p_gop->pic_param[5].rps[2].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6011  }
6012  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC2_USED)
6013  {
6014  p_gop->pic_param[5].rps[2].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6015  }
6016  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC3)
6017  {
6018  p_gop->pic_param[5].rps[3].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6019  }
6020  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G5_NUM_REF_PIC3_USED)
6021  {
6022  p_gop->pic_param[5].rps[3].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6023  }

6026  {
6027  p_gop->pic_param[6].poc_offset = atoi(value);
6028  }
6029  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_QP_OFFSET)
6030  {

6037  }
6038  */

6052  {
6053  p_gop->pic_param[6].rps[0].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6054  }
6055  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_PIC0_USED)
6056  {
6057  p_gop->pic_param[6].rps[0].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6058  }
6059  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_PIC1)
6060  {
6061  p_gop->pic_param[6].rps[1].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6062  }
6063  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_PIC1_USED)
6064  {
6065  p_gop->pic_param[6].rps[1].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6066  }
6067  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_PIC2)
6068  {
6069  p_gop->pic_param[6].rps[2].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6070  }
6071  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_PIC2_USED)
6072  {
6073  p_gop->pic_param[6].rps[2].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6074  }
6075  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_PIC3)
6076  {
6077  p_gop->pic_param[6].rps[3].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6078  }
6079  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G6_NUM_REF_PIC3_USED)
6080  {
6081  p_gop->pic_param[6].rps[3].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6082  }
6083 
6084  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_POC_OFFSET)
6085  {
6086  p_gop->pic_param[7].poc_offset = atoi(value);
6087  }
6088  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_QP_OFFSET)
6089  {
6090  p_gop->pic_param[7].qp_offset = atoi(value);
6091  }
6092  /*
6093  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_QP_FACTOR)
6094  {
6095  p_gop->pic_param[7].qp_factor = atof(value);
6096  }
6097  */
6098  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_TEMPORAL_ID)
6099  {
6100  p_gop->pic_param[7].temporal_id = atoi(value);
6101  }
6102  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_PIC_TYPE)
6103  {
6104  p_gop->pic_param[7].pic_type = atoi(value);
6105  }
6106  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PICS)
6107  {
6108  p_gop->pic_param[7].num_ref_pics = atoi(value);
6109  }
6110  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC0)
6111  {
6112  p_gop->pic_param[7].rps[0].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6113  }
6114  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC0_USED)
6115  {
6116  p_gop->pic_param[7].rps[0].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6117  }
6118  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC1)
6119  {
6120  p_gop->pic_param[7].rps[1].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6121  }
6122  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC1_USED)
6123  {
6124  p_gop->pic_param[7].rps[1].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6125  }
6126  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC2)
6127  {
6128  p_gop->pic_param[7].rps[2].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6129  }
6130  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC2_USED)
6131  {
6132  p_gop->pic_param[7].rps[2].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6133  }
6134  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC3)
6135  {
6136  p_gop->pic_param[7].rps[3].ref_pic = atoi(value);
6137  }
6138  OPT(NI_ENC_GOP_PARAMS_G7_NUM_REF_PIC3_USED)
6139  {
6140  p_gop->pic_param[7].rps[3].ref_pic_used = atoi(value);
6141  }
6142  else
6143  {
6144  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): Invalid parameter name passed\n", __func__);
6145  return NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_NAME;
6146  }
6147 #endif
6148 
6149 #undef OPT
6150 #undef OPT2
6151 #undef atobool
6152 #undef atoi
6153 #undef atof
6154 
6155  b_error |= bValueWasNull && !bNameWasBool;
6156 
6157  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit, b_error=%d\n", __func__, b_error);
6158 
6159  return (b_error ? NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE : NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS);
6160 }
6161 
6162 /*!*****************************************************************************
6163 * \brief Copy existing decoding session params for hw frame usage
6164 *
6165 * \param[in] src_p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated source session context
6166 * \param[in] dst_p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated destination session
6167 * context
6168 * \return On success
6169 * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
6170 * On failure
6171 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6172 ******************************************************************************/
6173 ni_retcode_t ni_device_session_copy(ni_session_context_t *src_p_ctx, ni_session_context_t *dst_p_ctx)
6174 {
6175  return ni_decoder_session_copy_internal(src_p_ctx, dst_p_ctx);
6176 }
6177 
6178 /*!*****************************************************************************
6179 * \brief Read data from the device
6180 * If device_type is NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER reads data hwdesc from
6181 * decoder
6182 * If device_type is NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER reads data hwdesc from
6183 * scaler
6184 *
6185 * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated
6186 * ni_session_context_t struct
6187 * \param[in] p_data Pointer to a caller allocated
6188 * ni_session_data_io_t struct which contains either a
6189 * ni_frame_t data frame or ni_packet_t data packet to
6190 * send
6191 * \param[in] device_type NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER or NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER
6192 * If NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER or NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER is specified,
6193 * hw descriptor info will be stored in p_data ni_frame
6194 * \return On success
6195 * Total number of bytes read
6196 * On failure
6197 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6198 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
6199 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
6200 ******************************************************************************/
6201 int ni_device_session_read_hwdesc(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, ni_session_data_io_t *p_data, ni_device_type_t device_type)
6202 {
6203  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s start\n", __func__);
6204  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6205  if ((!p_ctx) || (!p_data))
6206  {
6207  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
6208  __func__);
6209  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6210  }
6211 
6212  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6213  // In close state, let the close process execute first.
6214  if (p_ctx->xcoder_state & NI_XCODER_CLOSE_STATE ||
6215  #ifdef _WIN32
6216  (p_ctx->keep_alive_thread.handle &&
6217  #else
6218  (p_ctx->keep_alive_thread &&
6219  #endif
6220  p_ctx->keep_alive_thread_args->close_thread))
6221  {
6222  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s close state, return\n", __func__);
6223  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6224  ni_usleep(100);
6225  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6226  }
6227  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_READ_DESC_STATE;
6228  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6229 
6230  switch (device_type)
6231  {
6232  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER:
6233  {
6234  int seq_change_read_count = 0;
6235  for (;;)
6236  {
6237  //retval = ni_decoder_session_read(p_ctx, &(p_data->data.frame));
6238  retval = ni_decoder_session_read_desc(p_ctx, &(p_data->data.frame));
6239  // check resolution change only after initial setting obtained
6240  // p_data->data.frame.video_width is picture width and will be 32-align
6241  // adjusted to frame size; p_data->data.frame.video_height is the same as
6242  // frame size, then compare them to saved one for resolution checking
6243  //
6244  uint32_t aligned_width;
6245  if(QUADRA)
6246  {
6247  aligned_width = ((((p_data->data.frame.video_width * p_ctx->bit_depth_factor) + 127) / 128) * 128);
6248  }
6249  else
6250  {
6251  aligned_width = ((p_data->data.frame.video_width + 31) / 32) * 32;
6252  }
6253 
6254  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
6255  "FNum %" PRIu64
6256  ", DFVWxDFVH %u x %u, AlWid %u, AVW x AVH %u x %u\n",
6257  p_ctx->frame_num, p_data->data.frame.video_width,
6258  p_data->data.frame.video_height, aligned_width,
6259  p_ctx->active_video_width, p_ctx->active_video_height);
6260 
6261  if (0 == retval && seq_change_read_count)
6262  {
6263  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s (decoder): seq change NO data, next time.\n",
6264  __func__);
6265  p_ctx->active_video_width = 0;
6266  p_ctx->active_video_height = 0;
6267  p_ctx->actual_video_width = 0;
6268  break;
6269  }
6270  else if (retval < 0)
6271  {
6272  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s (decoder): failure ret %d, return ..\n",
6273  __func__, retval);
6274  break;
6275  }
6276  else if (p_ctx->frame_num && p_data->data.frame.video_width &&
6277  p_data->data.frame.video_height &&
6278  (aligned_width != p_ctx->active_video_width ||
6279  p_data->data.frame.video_height != p_ctx->active_video_height))
6280  {
6281  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
6282  "%s (decoder): resolution change, frame size "
6283  "%ux%u -> %ux%u, width %u bit %d, continue read ...\n",
6284  __func__, p_ctx->active_video_width,
6285  p_ctx->active_video_height, aligned_width,
6286  p_data->data.frame.video_height,
6287  p_data->data.frame.video_width, p_ctx->bit_depth_factor);
6288  // reset active video resolution to 0 so it can be queried in the re-read
6289  p_ctx->active_video_width = 0;
6290  p_ctx->active_video_height = 0;
6291  p_ctx->actual_video_width = 0;
6292  seq_change_read_count++;
6293  //break;
6294  }
6295  else
6296  {
6297  break;
6298  }
6299  }
6300  break;
6301  }
6302  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER:
6303  {
6304  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: Encoder has no hwdesc to read\n");
6305  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6306  }
6307 
6308  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER:
6309  {
6310  retval = ni_scaler_session_read_hwdesc(p_ctx, &(p_data->data.frame));
6311  break;
6312  }
6313 
6314  default:
6315  {
6316  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6317  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unrecognized device type: %d",
6318  __func__, device_type);
6319  break;
6320  }
6321  }
6322 
6323  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6324  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_READ_DESC_STATE;
6325  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6326 
6327  return retval;
6328 }
6329 
6330 /*!*****************************************************************************
6331 * \brief Reads YUV data from hw descriptor stored location on device
6332 *
6333 * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated
6334 * ni_session_context_t struct
6335 * \param[in] p_data Pointer to a caller allocated
6336 * ni_session_data_io_t struct which contains either a
6337 * ni_frame_t data frame or ni_packet_t data packet to
6338 * send
6339 * \param[in] hwdesc HW descriptor to find frame in XCODER
6340 * \return On success
6341 * Total number of bytes read
6342 * On failure
6343 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6344 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
6345 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
6346 *******************************************************************************/
6347 int ni_device_session_hwdl(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_session_data_io_t *p_data, niFrameSurface1_t* hwdesc)
6348 {
6349  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6350  if ((!hwdesc) || (!p_data))
6351  {
6352  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
6353  __func__);
6354  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6355  }
6356  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(p_ctx->pext_mutex);
6357  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_HWDL_STATE;
6358  p_ctx->session_id = hwdesc->ui16session_ID;
6359  p_ctx->blk_io_handle = (ni_device_handle_t)(int64_t)hwdesc->device_handle;
6360  p_ctx->codec_format = NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264; //unused
6361  p_ctx->bit_depth_factor = (int)hwdesc->bit_depth;
6362  p_ctx->hw_action = NI_CODEC_HW_DOWNLOAD;
6363 
6364  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: bit_depth_factor %d\n", __func__,
6365  p_ctx->bit_depth_factor);
6366 
6367  retval = ni_hwdownload_session_read(p_ctx, &(p_data->data.frame), hwdesc); //cut me down as needed
6368 
6369  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_HWDL_STATE;
6370  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(p_ctx->pext_mutex);
6371 
6372  return retval;
6373 }
6374 
6375 /*!*****************************************************************************
6376 * \brief Sends raw YUV input to uploader instance and retrieves a HW descriptor
6377 * to represent it
6378 *
6379 * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated
6380 * ni_session_context_t struct
6381 * \param[in] p_src_data Pointer to a caller allocated
6382 * ni_session_data_io_t struct which contains a
6383 * ni_frame_t data frame to send to uploader
6384 * \param[out] hwdesc HW descriptor to find frame in XCODER
6385 * \return On success
6386 * Total number of bytes read
6387 * On failure
6388 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6389 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
6390 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
6391 *******************************************************************************/
6392 int ni_device_session_hwup(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_session_data_io_t *p_src_data, niFrameSurface1_t* hwdesc)
6393 {
6394  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6395  if ((!hwdesc) || (!p_src_data))
6396  {
6397  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
6398  __func__);
6399  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6400  }
6401  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6402  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_HWUP_STATE;
6403 
6404  retval = ni_hwupload_session_write(p_ctx, &p_src_data->data.frame, hwdesc);
6405 
6406  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_HWUP_STATE;
6407  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6408 
6409  return retval;
6410 }
6411 
6412 /*!*****************************************************************************
6413 * \brief Allocate memory for the hwDescriptor buffer based on provided
6414 * parameters taking into account pic size and extra data.
6415 *
6416 * \param[in] p_frame Pointer to a caller allocated ni_frame_t struct
6417 *
6418 * \param[in] video_width Width of the video frame
6419 * \param[in] video_height Height of the video frame
6420 * \param[in] extra_len Extra data size (incl. meta data)
6421 *
6422 * \return On success
6423 * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
6424 * On failure
6425 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6426 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
6427 *****************************************************************************/
6428 ni_retcode_t ni_frame_buffer_alloc_hwenc(ni_frame_t* p_frame, int video_width,
6429  int video_height, int extra_len)
6430 {
6431  void* p_buffer = NULL;
6432  int height_aligned = video_height;
6433  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6434 
6435  if (!p_frame)
6436  {
6437  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
6438  __func__);
6439  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6440  }
6441 
6442  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: extra_len=%d\n", __func__, extra_len);
6443 
6444  int luma_size = 0;
6445  int chroma_b_size = 0;//luma_size / 4;
6446  int chroma_r_size = 0;//luma_size / 4;
6447  int buffer_size = (int)sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t) + extra_len;
6448 
6449  buffer_size = ((buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
6450 
6451  //Check if Need to free
6452  if ((p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size) && (p_frame->buffer_size > 0))
6453  {
6454  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: free current p_frame->buffer_size=%u\n",
6455  __func__, p_frame->buffer_size);
6456  ni_frame_buffer_free(p_frame);
6457  }
6458 
6459  //Check if need to realocate
6460  if (p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size)
6461  {
6462  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
6463  {
6464  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate p_frame buffer.\n",
6465  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
6466  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
6467  LRETURN;
6468  }
6469 
6470  // init once after allocation
6471  memset(p_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
6472  p_frame->buffer_size = buffer_size;
6473  p_frame->p_buffer = p_buffer;
6474 
6475  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: allocated new p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
6476  }
6477  else
6478  {
6479  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: reuse p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
6480  }
6481 
6482  p_frame->p_data[3] = p_frame->p_buffer;
6483  p_frame->p_data[0] = NULL;
6484  p_frame->p_data[1] = NULL;
6485  p_frame->p_data[2] = NULL;
6486 
6487  p_frame->data_len[0] = 0;//luma_size;
6488  p_frame->data_len[1] = 0;//chroma_b_size;
6489  p_frame->data_len[2] = 0;//chroma_r_size;
6490  p_frame->data_len[3] = sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t);
6491 
6492  p_frame->video_width = video_width;
6493  p_frame->video_height = height_aligned;
6494 
6495  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: success: p_frame->buffer_size=%u\n", __func__,
6496  p_frame->buffer_size);
6497 
6498 END:
6499 
6500  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
6501  {
6502  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
6503  }
6504 
6505  return retval;
6506 }
6507 
6508 /*!*****************************************************************************
6509 * \brief Recycle a frame buffer on card
6510 *
6511 * \param[in] surface Struct containing device and frame location to clear out
6512 * \param[in] device_handle handle to access device memory buffer is stored in
6513 *
6514 * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
6515 * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6516 *******************************************************************************/
6517 ni_retcode_t ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(niFrameSurface1_t *surface,
6518  int32_t device_handle)
6519 {
6520  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6521  if (surface)
6522  {
6523  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): Start cleaning out buffer\n", __func__);
6524  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
6525  "%s(): ui16FrameIdx=%d sessionId=%d device_handle=0x%x\n",
6526  __func__, surface->ui16FrameIdx, surface->ui16session_ID,
6527  device_handle);
6528  retval = ni_clear_instance_buf(surface, device_handle);
6529  }
6530  else
6531  {
6532  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): Surface is empty\n", __func__);
6533  }
6534  return retval;
6535 }
6536 
6537 /*!*****************************************************************************
6538 * \brief Sends frame pool setup info to device
6539 *
6540 * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated
6541 * ni_session_context_t struct
6542 * \param[in] pool_size Upload session initial allocated frames count
6543 * must be > 0,
6544 * \param[in] pool 0 use the normal pool
6545 * 1 use a dedicated P2P pool
6546 *
6547 * \return On success Return code
6548 * On failure
6549 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6550 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
6551 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
6552 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
6553 *******************************************************************************/
6554 int ni_device_session_init_framepool(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
6555  uint32_t pool_size, uint32_t pool)
6556 {
6557  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6558  if (!p_ctx)
6559  {
6560  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
6561  __func__);
6562  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6563  }
6564  if (pool_size == 0 || pool_size > NI_MAX_UPLOAD_INSTANCE_FRAMEPOOL)
6565  {
6566  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: Invalid poolsize == 0 or > 100\n");
6567  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6568  }
6569  if (pool != 0 && pool != 1)
6570  {
6571  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: bad pool number %u\n", pool);
6572  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6573  }
6574  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6575  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6576 
6577  retval = ni_config_instance_set_uploader_params(p_ctx, pool_size, pool);
6578 
6579  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6580  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6581 
6582  return retval;
6583 }
6584 
6585 /*!*****************************************************************************
6586  * \brief Set parameters on the device for the 2D engine
6587  *
6588  * \param[in] p_ctx pointer to session context
6589  * \param[in] p_params pointer to scaler parameters
6590  *
6591  * \return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6592  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
6593  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
6594  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
6595  ******************************************************************************/
6596 ni_retcode_t ni_scaler_set_params(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
6597  ni_scaler_params_t *p_params)
6598 {
6599  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6600 
6601  if (!p_ctx || !p_params)
6602  {
6603  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
6604  __func__);
6605  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6606  }
6607  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6608  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6609 
6610  retval = ni_config_instance_set_scaler_params(p_ctx, p_params);
6611 
6612  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6613  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6614 
6615  return retval;
6616 }
6617 
6618 /*!******************************************************************************
6619  * \brief Send a p_config command to configure scaling drawbox parameters.
6620  *
6621  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
6622  * \param ni_scaler_params_t * params - pointer to the scaler ni_scaler_drawbox params_t struct
6623  *
6624  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
6625 *******************************************************************************/
6626 ni_retcode_t ni_scaler_set_drawbox_params(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
6627  ni_scaler_drawbox_params_t *p_params)
6628 {
6629  void *p_scaler_config = NULL;
6630  ni_scaler_drawbox_params_t *p_cfg = NULL;
6631  uint32_t buffer_size = sizeof(ni_scaler_drawbox_params_t);
6632  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6633  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
6634 
6635  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
6636 
6637  if (!p_ctx || !p_params)
6638  {
6639  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n", __func__);
6640  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6641  LRETURN;
6642  }
6643 
6644  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
6645  {
6646  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n", __func__);
6647  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
6648  LRETURN;
6649  }
6650 
6651  buffer_size =
6652  ((buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) *
6653  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
6654  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_scaler_config, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
6655  {
6656  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() malloc p_scaler_config buffer failed\n",
6657  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
6658  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
6659  LRETURN;
6660  }
6661  memset(p_scaler_config, 0, buffer_size);
6662 
6663  //configure the session here
6664  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetScalerDrawBoxPara_W(p_ctx->session_id,
6665  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER);
6666 
6667  //Flip the bytes!!
6668  p_cfg = (ni_scaler_drawbox_params_t *)p_scaler_config;
6669  p_cfg->start_x = p_params->start_x;
6670  p_cfg->start_y = p_params->start_y;
6671  p_cfg->end_x = p_params->end_x;
6672  p_cfg->end_y = p_params->end_y;
6673  p_cfg->rgba_c = p_params->rgba_c;
6674 
6675  if (ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
6676  p_scaler_config, buffer_size, ui32LBA) < 0)
6677  {
6678  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
6679  "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_write_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64
6680  ", hw_id, %d, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
6681  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
6682  // Close the session since we can't configure it as per fw
6683  retval = ni_scaler_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
6684  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
6685  {
6686  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
6687  "ERROR: %s failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ","
6688  "hw_id, %d, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
6689  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
6690  p_ctx->session_id);
6691  }
6692 
6693  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
6694  }
6695 
6696 END:
6697 
6698  ni_aligned_free(p_scaler_config);
6699  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
6700 
6701  return retval;
6702 }
6703 
6704 /*!*****************************************************************************
6705  * \brief Allocate a frame on the device for 2D engine or AI engine
6706  * to work on based on provided parameters
6707  *
6708  * \param[in] p_ctx pointer to session context
6709  * \param[in] width width, in pixels
6710  * \param[in] height height, in pixels
6711  * \param[in] format pixel format
6712  * \param[in] options options bitmap flags, bit 0 (NI_SCALER_FLAG_IO) is
6713  * 0=input frame or 1=output frame. Bit 1 (NI_SCALER_FLAG_PC) is
6714  * 0=single allocation, 1=create pool. Bit 2 (NI_SCALER_FLAG_PA) is
6715  * 0=straight alpha, 1=premultiplied alpha
6716  * \param[in] rectangle_width clipping rectangle width
6717  * \param[in] rectangle_height clipping rectangle height
6718  * \param[in] rectangle_x horizontal position of clipping rectangle
6719  * \param[in] rectangle_y vertical position of clipping rectangle
6720  * \param[in] rgba_color RGBA fill colour (for padding only)
6721  * \param[in] frame_index input hwdesc index
6722  * \param[in] device_type only NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER
6723  * and NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI (only needs p_ctx and frame_index)
6724  *
6725  * \return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6726  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
6727  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
6728  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
6729  ******************************************************************************/
6730 ni_retcode_t ni_device_alloc_frame(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx,
6731  int width,
6732  int height,
6733  int format,
6734  int options,
6735  int rectangle_width,
6736  int rectangle_height,
6737  int rectangle_x,
6738  int rectangle_y,
6739  int rgba_color,
6740  int frame_index,
6741  ni_device_type_t device_type)
6742 {
6743  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6744 
6745  if (!p_ctx)
6746  {
6747  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
6748  __func__);
6749  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6750  }
6751  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6752  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6753 
6754  switch (device_type)
6755  {
6756  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER:
6757  retval = ni_scaler_alloc_frame(p_ctx,width, height, format, options,
6758  rectangle_width, rectangle_height,
6759  rectangle_x, rectangle_y,
6760  rgba_color, frame_index);
6761  break;
6762 
6763  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI:
6764  retval = ni_ai_alloc_hwframe(p_ctx, frame_index);
6765  break;
6766 
6767  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER:
6768  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER:
6769  /* fall through */
6770 
6771  default:
6772  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Bad device type %d\n", device_type);
6773  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6774  break;
6775  }
6776 
6777  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6778  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6779 
6780  return retval;
6781 }
6782 
6783 /*!*****************************************************************************
6784  * \brief Configure the 2D engine to work based on provided parameters
6785  *
6786  * \param[in] p_ctx pointer to session context
6787  * \param[in] p_cfg pointer to frame configuration
6788  *
6789  * \return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6790  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
6791  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
6792  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
6793  ******************************************************************************/
6794 ni_retcode_t ni_device_config_frame(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
6795  ni_frame_config_t *p_cfg)
6796 {
6797  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6798 
6799  if (!p_ctx || !p_cfg)
6800  {
6801  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
6802  __func__);
6803  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6804  }
6805 
6806  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6807  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6808 
6809  switch (p_ctx->device_type)
6810  {
6811  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER:
6812  retval = ni_scaler_config_frame(p_ctx, p_cfg);
6813  break;
6814 
6815  default:
6816  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Bad device type %d\n", p_ctx->device_type);
6817  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6818  break;
6819  }
6820 
6821  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6822  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6823 
6824  return retval;
6825 }
6826 
6827 /*!*****************************************************************************
6828  * \brief Configure the 2D engine to work based on provided parameters
6829  *
6830  * \param[in] p_ctx pointer to session context
6831  * \param[in] p_cfg_in pointer to input frame configuration
6832  * \param[in] numInCfgs number of input frame configurations
6833  * \param[in] p_cfg_out pointer to output frame configuration
6834  *
6835  * \return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6836  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
6837  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
6838  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
6839  ******************************************************************************/
6840 ni_retcode_t ni_device_multi_config_frame(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
6841  ni_frame_config_t p_cfg_in[],
6842  int numInCfgs,
6843  ni_frame_config_t *p_cfg_out)
6844 {
6845  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6846 
6847  if (!p_ctx || !p_cfg_in)
6848  {
6849  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
6850  __func__);
6851  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6852  }
6853 
6854  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6855  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6856 
6857  switch (p_ctx->device_type)
6858  {
6859  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER:
6860  retval = ni_scaler_multi_config_frame(p_ctx, p_cfg_in, numInCfgs, p_cfg_out);
6861  break;
6862 
6863  default:
6864  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Bad device type %d\n", p_ctx->device_type);
6865  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6866  break;
6867  }
6868 
6869  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
6870  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
6871 
6872  return retval;
6873 }
6874 
6875 /*!*****************************************************************************
6876  * \brief Calculate the total size of a frame based on the upload
6877  * context attributes and includes rounding up to the page size
6878  *
6879  * \param[in] p_upl_ctx pointer to an uploader session context
6880  * \param[in] linesize array of line stride
6881  *
6882  * \return size
6883  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6884  *
6885  ******************************************************************************/
6886 int ni_calculate_total_frame_size(const ni_session_context_t *p_upl_ctx,
6887  const int linesize[])
6888 {
6889  int pixel_format;
6890  int width, height;
6891  int alignedh;
6892  int luma, chroma_b, chroma_r;
6893  int total;
6894 
6895  pixel_format = p_upl_ctx->pixel_format;
6896  width = p_upl_ctx->active_video_width;
6897  height = p_upl_ctx->active_video_height;
6898 
6899  switch (pixel_format)
6900  {
6901  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
6902  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
6903  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
6904  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
6905  if (width < 0 || width > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_WIDTH)
6906  {
6907  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6908  }
6909 
6910  if ((height < 0) || (height > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT))
6911  {
6912  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6913  }
6914  break;
6915 
6916  case NI_PIX_FMT_RGBA:
6917  if ((width < 0) || (width > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_WIDTH))
6918  {
6919  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6920  }
6921 
6922  if ((height < 0) || (height > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT))
6923  {
6924  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6925  }
6926  break;
6927 
6928  default:
6929  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6930  }
6931 
6932  alignedh = NI_VPU_CEIL(height, 2);
6933 
6934  switch (pixel_format)
6935  {
6936  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
6937  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
6938  luma = linesize[0] * alignedh;
6939  chroma_b = linesize[1] * alignedh / 2;
6940  chroma_r = linesize[2] * alignedh / 2;
6941  total =
6942  luma + chroma_b + chroma_r + NI_APP_ENC_FRAME_META_DATA_SIZE;
6943  break;
6944 
6945  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
6946  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
6947  luma = linesize[0] * alignedh;
6948  chroma_b = linesize[1] * alignedh / 2;
6949  chroma_r = 0;
6950  total =
6951  luma + chroma_b + chroma_r + NI_APP_ENC_FRAME_META_DATA_SIZE;
6952  break;
6953 
6954  case NI_PIX_FMT_RGBA:
6955  total = width * height * 4 + NI_APP_ENC_FRAME_META_DATA_SIZE;
6956  break;
6957 
6958  default:
6959  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
6960  break;
6961  }
6962 
6963  total = NI_VPU_CEIL(total, NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
6964 
6965  return total;
6966 }
6967 
6968 /*!*****************************************************************************
6969  * \brief Allocate memory for the frame buffer based on provided parameters
6970  * taking into account the pixel format, width, height, stride,
6971  * alignment, and extra data
6972  * \param[in] p_frame Pointer to caller allocated ni_frame_t
6973  * \param[in] pixel_format a pixel format in ni_pix_fmt_t enum
6974  * \param[in] video_width width, in pixels
6975  * \param[in] video_height height, in pixels
6976  * \param[in] linesize horizontal stride
6977  * \param[in] alignment apply a 16 pixel height alignment (T408 only)
6978  * \param[in] extra_len meta data size
6979  *
6980  * \return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
6981  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
6982  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
6983  *
6984  ******************************************************************************/
6985 ni_retcode_t ni_frame_buffer_alloc_pixfmt(ni_frame_t *p_frame, int pixel_format,
6986  int video_width, int video_height,
6987  int linesize[], int alignment,
6988  int extra_len)
6989 {
6990  int buffer_size;
6991  void *p_buffer = NULL;
6992  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
6993  int height_aligned;
6994  int luma_size = 0;
6995  int chroma_b_size = 0;
6996  int chroma_r_size = 0;
6997 
6998  if (!p_frame)
6999  {
7000  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Invalid frame pointer\n");
7001  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7002  }
7003 
7004  switch (pixel_format)
7005  {
7006  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
7007  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
7008  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
7009  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
7010  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV16:
7011  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUYV422:
7012  case NI_PIX_FMT_UYVY422:
7013  if ((video_width < 0) || (video_width > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_WIDTH))
7014  {
7015  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Video resolution width %d out of range\n",
7016  video_width);
7017  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7018  }
7019 
7020  if ((video_height < 0) || (video_height > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT))
7021  {
7022  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Video resolution height %d out of range\n",
7023  video_width);
7024  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7025  }
7026  break;
7027 
7028  case NI_PIX_FMT_RGBA:
7029  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGRA:
7030  case NI_PIX_FMT_ARGB:
7031  case NI_PIX_FMT_ABGR:
7032  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGR0:
7033  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGRP:
7034  /*
7035  * For 2D engine using RGBA, the minimum width is 32. There is no
7036  * height restriction. The 2D engine supports a height/width of up to
7037  * 32K but but we will limit the max height and width to 8K.
7038  */
7039  if ((video_width < 32) && (video_width > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_WIDTH))
7040  {
7041  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Video resolution width %d out of range\n",
7042  video_width);
7043  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7044  }
7045 
7046  if ((video_height <= 0) || (video_height > NI_MAX_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT))
7047  {
7048  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Video resolution height %d out of range\n",
7049  video_height);
7050  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7051  }
7052  break;
7053 
7054  default:
7055  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Unknown pixel format %d\n",pixel_format);
7056  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7057  }
7058 
7059  if (QUADRA)
7060  {
7061  /* Quadra requires an even-numbered height/width */
7062  height_aligned = NI_VPU_CEIL(video_height, 2);
7063  }
7064  else
7065  {
7066  height_aligned = NI_VPU_ALIGN8(video_height);
7067 
7068  if (alignment)
7069  {
7070  /* 16-pixel aligned pixel height for Quadra */
7071  height_aligned = NI_VPU_ALIGN16(video_height);
7072  }
7073  }
7074 
7075  switch (pixel_format)
7076  {
7077  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
7078  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
7079  luma_size = linesize[0] * height_aligned;
7080 
7081  if (QUADRA)
7082  {
7083  chroma_b_size = linesize[1] * height_aligned / 2;
7084  chroma_r_size = linesize[2] * height_aligned / 2;
7085  }
7086  else
7087  {
7088  chroma_b_size = luma_size / 4;
7089  chroma_r_size = luma_size / 4;
7090  }
7091  break;
7092 
7093  case NI_PIX_FMT_RGBA:
7094  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGRA:
7095  case NI_PIX_FMT_ARGB:
7096  case NI_PIX_FMT_ABGR:
7097  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGR0:
7098  luma_size = linesize[0] * video_height;
7099  chroma_b_size = 0;
7100  chroma_r_size = 0;
7101  break;
7102 
7103  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
7104  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
7105  if (QUADRA)
7106  {
7107  luma_size = linesize[0] * height_aligned;
7108  chroma_b_size = linesize[1] * height_aligned / 2;
7109  chroma_r_size = 0;
7110  break;
7111  }
7112  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV16:
7113  if (QUADRA)
7114  {
7115  luma_size = linesize[0] * video_height;
7116  chroma_b_size = linesize[1] * video_height;
7117  chroma_r_size = 0;
7118  break;
7119  }
7120  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUYV422:
7121  case NI_PIX_FMT_UYVY422:
7122  if (QUADRA)
7123  {
7124  luma_size = linesize[0] * video_height;
7125  chroma_b_size = 0;
7126  chroma_r_size = 0;
7127  break;
7128  }
7129  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGRP:
7130  if (QUADRA)
7131  {
7132  luma_size = NI_VPU_ALIGN32(linesize[0] * video_height);
7133  chroma_b_size = NI_VPU_ALIGN32(linesize[1] * video_height);
7134  chroma_r_size = NI_VPU_ALIGN32(linesize[2] * video_height);
7135  break;
7136  }
7137  /*fall through*/
7138  default:
7139  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: unsupported pixel format %d\n",pixel_format);
7140  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7141  }
7142 
7143  buffer_size = luma_size + chroma_b_size + chroma_r_size + extra_len;
7144 
7145  /* Allocate a buffer size that is page aligned for the host */
7146  buffer_size = NI_VPU_CEIL(buffer_size,NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
7147 
7148  /* If this buffer has a different size, realloc a new buffer */
7149  if ((p_frame->buffer_size > 0) && (p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size))
7150  {
7151  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Free current p_frame, p_frame->buffer_size %u\n",
7152  p_frame->buffer_size);
7153  ni_frame_buffer_free(p_frame);
7154  }
7155 
7156  if (p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size)
7157  {
7158  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
7159  {
7160  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: Cannot allocate p_frame\n");
7161  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
7162  LRETURN;
7163  }
7164 
7165  memset(p_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
7166  p_frame->buffer_size = buffer_size;
7167  p_frame->p_buffer = p_buffer;
7168  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: allocated new p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
7169  }
7170  else
7171  {
7172  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: reuse p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
7173  }
7174 
7175  switch (pixel_format)
7176  {
7177  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
7178  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
7179  p_frame->p_data[0] = p_frame->p_buffer;
7180  p_frame->p_data[1] = p_frame->p_data[0] + luma_size;
7181  p_frame->p_data[2] = p_frame->p_data[1] + chroma_b_size;
7182  p_frame->p_data[3] = NULL;
7183 
7184  p_frame->data_len[0] = luma_size;
7185  p_frame->data_len[1] = chroma_b_size;
7186  p_frame->data_len[2] = chroma_r_size;
7187  p_frame->data_len[3] = 0;
7188  video_width = NI_VPU_ALIGN128(video_width);
7189  break;
7190 
7191  case NI_PIX_FMT_RGBA:
7192  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGRA:
7193  case NI_PIX_FMT_ARGB:
7194  case NI_PIX_FMT_ABGR:
7195  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGR0:
7196  p_frame->p_data[0] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer;
7197  p_frame->p_data[1] = NULL;
7198  p_frame->p_data[2] = NULL;
7199  p_frame->p_data[3] = NULL;
7200 
7201  p_frame->data_len[0] = luma_size;
7202  p_frame->data_len[1] = 0;
7203  p_frame->data_len[2] = 0;
7204  p_frame->data_len[3] = 0;
7205  video_width = NI_VPU_ALIGN16(video_width);
7206  break;
7207 
7208  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
7209  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
7210  if (QUADRA)
7211  {
7212  p_frame->p_data[0] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer;
7213  p_frame->p_data[1] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_data[0] + luma_size;
7214  p_frame->p_data[2] = NULL;
7215  p_frame->p_data[3] = NULL;
7216 
7217  p_frame->data_len[0] = luma_size;
7218  p_frame->data_len[1] = chroma_b_size;
7219  p_frame->data_len[2] = 0;
7220  p_frame->data_len[3] = 0;
7221 
7222  video_width = NI_VPU_ALIGN128(video_width);
7223  break;
7224  }
7225  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV16:
7226  if (QUADRA)
7227  {
7228  p_frame->p_data[0] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer;
7229  p_frame->p_data[1] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_data[0] + luma_size;
7230  p_frame->p_data[2] = NULL;
7231  p_frame->p_data[3] = NULL;
7232 
7233  p_frame->data_len[0] = luma_size;
7234  p_frame->data_len[1] = chroma_b_size;
7235  p_frame->data_len[2] = 0;
7236  p_frame->data_len[3] = 0;
7237  break;
7238  }
7239 
7240  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUYV422:
7241  case NI_PIX_FMT_UYVY422:
7242  if (QUADRA)
7243  {
7244  p_frame->p_data[0] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer;
7245  p_frame->p_data[1] = NULL;
7246  p_frame->p_data[2] = NULL;
7247  p_frame->p_data[3] = NULL;
7248 
7249  p_frame->data_len[0] = luma_size;
7250  p_frame->data_len[1] = 0;
7251  p_frame->data_len[2] = 0;
7252  p_frame->data_len[3] = 0;
7253  video_width = NI_VPU_ALIGN16(video_width);
7254  break;
7255  }
7256  case NI_PIX_FMT_BGRP:
7257  if (QUADRA)
7258  {
7259  p_frame->p_data[0] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer;
7260  p_frame->p_data[1] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_data[0] + luma_size;
7261  p_frame->p_data[2] = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_data[1] + chroma_b_size;
7262  p_frame->p_data[3] = NULL;
7263 
7264  p_frame->data_len[0] = luma_size;
7265  p_frame->data_len[1] = chroma_b_size;
7266  p_frame->data_len[2] = chroma_r_size;
7267  p_frame->data_len[3] = 0;
7268  break;
7269  }
7270  /* fall through */
7271  default:
7272  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: unsupported pixel format %d\n",pixel_format);
7273  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7274  LRETURN;
7275  }
7276 
7277  p_frame->video_width = video_width;
7278  p_frame->video_height = height_aligned;
7279 
7280  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s success: w=%d; h=%d; aligned buffer size=%d\n",
7281  __func__, video_width, video_height, buffer_size);
7282 
7283 END:
7284 
7285  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
7286  {
7287  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
7288  }
7289 
7290  return retval;
7291 }
7292 
7293 ni_retcode_t ni_ai_config_network_binary(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
7294  ni_network_data_t *p_network,
7295  const char *file)
7296 {
7297  FILE *fp = NULL;
7298  struct stat file_stat;
7299  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7300  unsigned char *buffer = NULL;
7301 
7302  if (!p_ctx)
7303  {
7304  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
7305  __func__);
7306  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7307  }
7308  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7309  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7310 
7311  if (stat(file, &file_stat) != 0)
7312  {
7313  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: failed to get network binary file stat, %s\n",
7314  __func__, strerror(NI_ERRNO));
7315  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
7316  LRETURN;
7317  }
7318 
7319  if (file_stat.st_size == 0)
7320  {
7321  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: network binary size is null\n", __func__);
7322  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
7323  LRETURN;
7324  }
7325 
7326  fp = fopen(file, "rb");
7327  if (!fp)
7328  {
7329  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: failed to open network binary, %s\n", __func__,
7330  strerror(NI_ERRNO));
7331  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
7332  LRETURN;
7333  }
7334 
7335  buffer = malloc(file_stat.st_size);
7336  if (!buffer)
7337  {
7338  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: failed to alloate memory\n", __func__);
7339  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
7340  LRETURN;
7341  }
7342 
7343  if (fread(buffer, file_stat.st_size, 1, fp) != 1)
7344  {
7345  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: failed to read network binary\n", __func__);
7346  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
7347  LRETURN;
7348  }
7349 
7350  retval =
7351  ni_config_instance_network_binary(p_ctx, buffer, file_stat.st_size);
7352  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
7353  {
7354  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: failed to configure instance, retval %d\n",
7355  __func__, retval);
7356  LRETURN;
7357  }
7358 
7359  retval = ni_config_read_inout_layers(p_ctx, p_network);
7360  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
7361  {
7362  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: failed to read network layers, retval %d\n",
7363  retval);
7364  }
7365 
7366 END:
7367 
7368  if (fp)
7369  {
7370  fclose(fp);
7371  }
7372  ni_aligned_free(buffer);
7373 
7374  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7375  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7376 
7377  return retval;
7378 }
7379 
7380 ni_retcode_t ni_ai_frame_buffer_alloc(ni_frame_t *p_frame,
7381  ni_network_data_t *p_network)
7382 {
7383  uint32_t buffer_size = 0;
7384  void *p_buffer = NULL;
7385  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7386  uint32_t i, this_size;
7387  ni_network_layer_info_t *p_linfo;
7388 
7389  if (!p_frame || !p_network)
7390  {
7391  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Invalid frame or network layer pointer\n");
7392  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7393  }
7394 
7395  p_linfo = &p_network->linfo;
7396  for (i = 0; i < p_network->input_num; i++)
7397  {
7398  this_size = ni_ai_network_layer_size(&p_linfo->in_param[i]);
7399  this_size =
7400  (this_size + NI_AI_HW_ALIGN_SIZE - 1) & ~(NI_AI_HW_ALIGN_SIZE - 1);
7401  if (p_network->inset[i].offset != buffer_size)
7402  {
7403  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
7404  "ERROR: %s(): invalid buffer_size of network\n", __func__);
7405  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7406  }
7407  buffer_size += this_size;
7408  }
7409 
7410  /* fixed size */
7411  p_frame->data_len[0] = buffer_size;
7412 
7413  /* Allocate a buffer size that is page aligned for the host */
7414  buffer_size = (buffer_size + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1) &
7415  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
7416 
7417  /* If this buffer has a different size, realloc a new buffer */
7418  if ((p_frame->buffer_size > 0) && (p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size))
7419  {
7420  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Free current p_frame, p_frame->buffer_size %u\n",
7421  p_frame->buffer_size);
7422  ni_frame_buffer_free(p_frame);
7423  }
7424 
7425  if (p_frame->buffer_size != buffer_size)
7426  {
7427  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
7428  {
7429  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: Cannot allocate p_frame\n");
7430  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
7431  LRETURN;
7432  }
7433 
7434  // memset(p_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
7435  p_frame->buffer_size = buffer_size;
7436  p_frame->p_buffer = p_buffer;
7437  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): allocated new p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
7438  } else
7439  {
7440  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): reuse p_frame buffer\n", __func__);
7441  }
7442 
7443  p_frame->p_data[0] = p_frame->p_buffer;
7444  p_frame->p_data[1] = NULL;
7445  p_frame->p_data[2] = NULL;
7446  p_frame->p_data[3] = NULL;
7447 
7448  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s() success: aligned buffer size=%u\n", __func__,
7449  buffer_size);
7450 
7451 END:
7452 
7453  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
7454  {
7455  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
7456  }
7457 
7458  return retval;
7459 }
7460 
7461 ni_retcode_t ni_ai_packet_buffer_alloc(ni_packet_t *p_packet,
7462  ni_network_data_t *p_network)
7463 {
7464  void *p_buffer = NULL;
7465  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7466  uint32_t buffer_size = 0;
7467  uint32_t i, this_size;
7468  ni_network_layer_info_t *p_linfo;
7469 
7470  if (!p_packet || !p_network)
7471  {
7472  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): null pointer parameters passed\n",
7473  __func__);
7474  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7475  }
7476 
7477  p_linfo = &p_network->linfo;
7478  for (i = 0; i < p_network->output_num; i++)
7479  {
7480  this_size = ni_ai_network_layer_size(&p_linfo->out_param[i]);
7481  this_size =
7482  (this_size + NI_AI_HW_ALIGN_SIZE - 1) & ~(NI_AI_HW_ALIGN_SIZE - 1);
7483  if (p_network->outset[i].offset != buffer_size)
7484  {
7485  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
7486  "ERROR: %s(): invalid buffer_size of network\n", __func__);
7487  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7488  }
7489  buffer_size += this_size;
7490  }
7491 
7492  this_size = buffer_size;
7493  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): packet_size=%u\n", __func__, buffer_size);
7494 
7495  if (buffer_size & (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1))
7496  {
7497  buffer_size = (buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) &
7498  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
7499  }
7500 
7501  if (p_packet->buffer_size == buffer_size)
7502  {
7503  p_packet->p_data = p_packet->p_buffer;
7504  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): reuse current p_packet buffer\n", __func__);
7505  LRETURN; //Already allocated the exact size
7506  } else if (p_packet->buffer_size > 0)
7507  {
7508  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
7509  "%s(): free current p_packet, p_packet->buffer_size=%u\n",
7510  __func__, p_packet->buffer_size);
7511  ni_packet_buffer_free(p_packet);
7512  }
7513  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): Allocating p_packet buffer, buffer_size=%u\n",
7514  __func__, buffer_size);
7515 
7516  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
7517  {
7518  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate p_packet buffer.\n",
7519  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
7520  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
7521  LRETURN;
7522  }
7523 
7524  p_packet->buffer_size = buffer_size;
7525  p_packet->p_buffer = p_buffer;
7526  p_packet->p_data = p_packet->p_buffer;
7527  p_packet->data_len = this_size;
7528 
7529 END:
7530 
7531  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
7532  {
7533  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
7534  }
7535 
7536  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit: p_packet->buffer_size=%u\n", __func__,
