7537  p_packet->buffer_size);
7538 
7539  return retval;
7540 }
7541 
7542 /*!*****************************************************************************
7543  * \brief Reconfigure bitrate dynamically during encoding.
7544  *
7545  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to caller allocated ni_session_context_t
7546  * \param[in] bitrate Target bitrate to set
7547  *
7548  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7549  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7550  ******************************************************************************/
7551 ni_retcode_t ni_reconfig_bitrate(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, int32_t bitrate)
7552 {
7553  if (!p_ctx || bitrate < NI_MIN_BITRATE || bitrate > NI_MAX_BITRATE)
7554  {
7555  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): invalid bitrate passed in %d\n",
7556  __func__, bitrate);
7557  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7558  }
7559  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7560  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7561 
7562  if (p_ctx->target_bitrate > 0)
7563  {
7564  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
7565  "Warning: %s(): bitrate %d overwriting current one %d\n",
7566  __func__, bitrate, p_ctx->target_bitrate);
7567  }
7568 
7569  p_ctx->target_bitrate = bitrate;
7570 
7571  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7572  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7573 
7574  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7575 }
7576 
7577 /*!*****************************************************************************
7578  * \brief Reconfigure VUI HRD dynamically during encoding.
7579  *
7580  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to caller allocated ni_session_context_t
7581  * \param[in] bitrate Target bitrate to set
7582  *
7583  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7584  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7585  ******************************************************************************/
7586 ni_retcode_t ni_reconfig_vui(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, ni_vui_hrd_t *vui)
7587 {
7588  if (!p_ctx || vui->colorDescPresent < 0 || vui->colorDescPresent > 1)
7589  {
7590  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): invalid colorDescPresent passed in %d\n",
7591  __func__, vui->colorDescPresent);
7592  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7593  }
7594 
7595  if ((vui->aspectRatioWidth > NI_MAX_ASPECTRATIO) || (vui->aspectRatioHeight > NI_MAX_ASPECTRATIO))
7596  {
7597  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): invalid aspect ratio passed in (%dx%d)\n",
7598  __func__, vui->aspectRatioWidth, vui->aspectRatioHeight);
7599  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7600  }
7601 
7602  if (vui->videoFullRange < 0 || vui->videoFullRange > 1)
7603  {
7604  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): invalid videoFullRange passed in %d\n",
7605  __func__, vui->videoFullRange);
7606  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7607  }
7608 
7609  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7610  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7611 
7612  p_ctx->vui.colorDescPresent = vui->colorDescPresent;
7613  p_ctx->vui.colorPrimaries = vui->colorPrimaries;
7614  p_ctx->vui.colorTrc = vui->colorTrc;
7615  p_ctx->vui.colorSpace = vui->colorSpace;
7616  p_ctx->vui.aspectRatioWidth = vui->aspectRatioWidth;
7617  p_ctx->vui.aspectRatioHeight = vui->aspectRatioHeight;
7618  p_ctx->vui.videoFullRange = vui->videoFullRange;
7619 
7620  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7621  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7622 
7623  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7624 }
7625 
7626 /*!*****************************************************************************
7627  * \brief Force next frame to be IDR frame during encoding.
7628  *
7629  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to caller allocated ni_session_context_t
7630  *
7631  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7632  ******************************************************************************/
7633 ni_retcode_t ni_force_idr_frame_type(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx)
7634 {
7635  if (!p_ctx)
7636  {
7637  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
7638  __func__);
7639  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7640  }
7641  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7642  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7643 
7644  if (p_ctx->force_idr_frame)
7645  {
7646  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning: %s(): already forcing IDR frame\n",
7647  __func__);
7648  }
7649 
7650  p_ctx->force_idr_frame = 1;
7651 
7652  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7653  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7654 
7655  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7656 }
7657 
7658 /*!*****************************************************************************
7659  * \brief Set a frame's support of Long Term Reference frame during encoding.
7660  *
7661  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to caller allocated ni_session_context_t
7662  * \param[in] ltr Pointer to struct specifying LTR support
7663  *
7664  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7665  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7666  ******************************************************************************/
7667 ni_retcode_t ni_set_ltr(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, ni_long_term_ref_t *ltr)
7668 {
7669  if (!p_ctx)
7670  {
7671  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
7672  __func__);
7673  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7674  }
7675  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7676 
7677  p_ctx->ltr_to_set.use_cur_src_as_long_term_pic =
7678  ltr->use_cur_src_as_long_term_pic;
7679  p_ctx->ltr_to_set.use_long_term_ref = ltr->use_long_term_ref;
7680 
7681  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7682 
7683  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7684 }
7685 
7686 /*!*****************************************************************************
7687  * \brief Set Long Term Reference interval
7688  *
7689  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to caller allocated ni_session_context_t
7690  * \param[in] ltr_interval the new long term reference inteval value
7691  *
7692  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7693  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7694  ******************************************************************************/
7695 ni_retcode_t ni_set_ltr_interval(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
7696  int32_t ltr_interval)
7697 {
7698  if (!p_ctx)
7699  {
7700  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
7701  __func__);
7702  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7703  }
7704  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7705 
7706  p_ctx->ltr_interval = ltr_interval;
7707 
7708  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7709 
7710  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7711 }
7712 
7713 /*!*****************************************************************************
7714  * \brief Set frame reference invalidation
7715  *
7716  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to caller allocated ni_session_context_t
7717  * \param[in] frame_num frame number after which all references shall be
7718  * invalidated
7719  *
7720  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7721  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7722  ******************************************************************************/
7723 ni_retcode_t ni_set_frame_ref_invalid(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
7724  int32_t frame_num)
7725 {
7726  if (!p_ctx)
7727  {
7728  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null, return\n",
7729  __func__);
7730  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7731  }
7732  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7733  p_ctx->ltr_frame_ref_invalid = frame_num;
7734  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7735 
7736  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7737 }
7738 
7739 /*!*****************************************************************************
7740  * \brief Reconfigure framerate dynamically during encoding.
7741  *
7742  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to caller allocated ni_session_context_t
7743  * \param[in] framerate Target framerate to set
7744  *
7745  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7746  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7747  ******************************************************************************/
7748 ni_retcode_t ni_reconfig_framerate(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
7749  ni_framerate_t *framerate)
7750 {
7751  int32_t framerate_num = framerate->framerate_num;
7752  int32_t framerate_denom = framerate->framerate_denom;
7753  if (!p_ctx || framerate_num <= 0 || framerate_denom <= 0)
7754  {
7755  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
7756  "ERROR: %s(): invalid framerate passed in (%d/%d)\n", __func__,
7757  framerate_num, framerate_denom);
7758  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7759  }
7760 
7761  if ((framerate_num % framerate_denom) != 0)
7762  {
7763  uint32_t numUnitsInTick = 1000;
7764  framerate_num = framerate_num / framerate_denom;
7765  framerate_denom = numUnitsInTick + 1;
7766  framerate_num += 1;
7767  framerate_num *= numUnitsInTick;
7768  } else
7769  {
7770  framerate_num = framerate_num / framerate_denom;
7771  framerate_denom = 1;
7772  }
7773 
7774  if (((framerate_num + framerate_denom - 1) / framerate_denom) >
7775  NI_MAX_FRAMERATE)
7776  {
7777  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
7778  "ERROR: %s(): invalid framerate passed in (%d/%d)\n", __func__,
7779  framerate->framerate_num, framerate->framerate_denom);
7780  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7781  }
7782 
7783  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7784  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7785 
7786  if (p_ctx->framerate.framerate_num > 0)
7787  {
7788  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
7789  "Warning: %s(): framerate (%d/%d) overwriting current "
7790  "one (%d/%d)\n",
7791  __func__, framerate_num, framerate_denom,
7792  p_ctx->framerate.framerate_num,
7793  p_ctx->framerate.framerate_denom);
7794  }
7795 
7796  p_ctx->framerate.framerate_num = framerate_num;
7797  p_ctx->framerate.framerate_denom = framerate_denom;
7798 
7799  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7800  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7801 
7802  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7803 }
7804 
7805 /*!*****************************************************************************
7806  * \brief Reconfigure maxFrameSize dynamically during encoding.
7807  *
7808  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to caller allocated ni_session_context_t
7809  * \param[in] bitrate maxFrameSize to set
7810  *
7811  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7812  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7813  ******************************************************************************/
7814 ni_retcode_t ni_reconfig_max_frame_size(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, int32_t max_frame_size)
7815 {
7816  ni_xcoder_params_t *api_param;
7817  int32_t bitrate, framerate_num, framerate_denom;
7818  uint32_t maxFrameSize = (uint32_t)max_frame_size / 2000;
7819  uint32_t min_maxFrameSize;
7820 
7821  if (!p_ctx || !p_ctx->p_session_config)
7822  {
7823  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): invalid ni_session_context_t or p_session_config pointer\n",
7824  __func__);
7825  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7826  }
7827 
7828  api_param = (ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_ctx->p_session_config;
7829 
7830  if (!api_param->low_delay_mode)
7831  {
7832  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): max_frame_size is valid only when lowDelay mode is enabled\n",
7833  __func__, max_frame_size);
7834  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7835  }
7836 
7837  bitrate = (p_ctx->target_bitrate > 0) ? p_ctx->target_bitrate : api_param->bitrate;
7838 
7839  if ((p_ctx->framerate.framerate_num > 0) && (p_ctx->framerate.framerate_denom > 0))
7840  {
7841  framerate_num = p_ctx->framerate.framerate_num;
7842  framerate_denom = p_ctx->framerate.framerate_denom;
7843  }
7844  else
7845  {
7846  framerate_num = (int32_t) api_param->fps_number;
7847  framerate_denom = (int32_t) api_param->fps_denominator;
7848  }
7849 
7850  min_maxFrameSize = (((uint32_t)bitrate / framerate_num * framerate_denom) / 8) / 2000;
7851 
7852  if (maxFrameSize < min_maxFrameSize)
7853  {
7854  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): max_frame_size %d is too small (invalid)\n",
7855  __func__, max_frame_size);
7856  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7857  }
7858 
7859  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7860  p_ctx->xcoder_state |= NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7861 
7862  if (p_ctx->max_frame_size > 0)
7863  {
7864  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
7865  "Warning: %s(): max_frame_size %d overwriting current one %d\n",
7866  __func__, max_frame_size, p_ctx->max_frame_size);
7867  }
7868 
7869  p_ctx->max_frame_size = max_frame_size;
7870 
7871  p_ctx->xcoder_state &= ~NI_XCODER_GENERAL_STATE;
7872  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7873 
7874  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7875 }
7876 
7877 
7878 #ifndef _WIN32
7879 /*!*****************************************************************************
7880 * \brief Acquire a P2P frame buffer from the hwupload session
7881 *
7882 * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated
7883 * ni_session_context_t struct
7884 * \param[out] p_frame Pointer to a caller allocated hw frame
7885 *
7886 * \return On success
7887 * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7888 * On failure
7889 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7890 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
7891 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
7892 *******************************************************************************/
7893 int ni_device_session_acquire(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, ni_frame_t *p_frame)
7894 {
7895  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7896  struct netint_iocmd_export_dmabuf uexp;
7897  unsigned int offset;
7898  int ret, is_semi_planar;
7899  int linestride[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS];
7900  int alignedheight[NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS];
7901  niFrameSurface1_t hwdesc = {0};
7902  niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface;
7903 
7904  if (p_ctx == NULL || p_frame == NULL || p_frame->p_data[3] == NULL)
7905  {
7906  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
7907  __func__);
7908  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7909  }
7910 
7911  p_surface = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_frame->p_data[3];
7912 
7913  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7914  p_ctx->xcoder_state = NI_XCODER_HWUP_STATE;
7915 
7916  retval = ni_hwupload_session_read_hwdesc(p_ctx, &hwdesc);
7917 
7918  p_ctx->xcoder_state = NI_XCODER_IDLE_STATE;
7919  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
7920 
7921  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
7922  {
7923  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: hwdesc read failure %d\n", retval);
7924  return retval;
7925  }
7926 
7927  retval = ni_get_memory_offset(p_ctx, &hwdesc, &offset);
7928  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
7929  {
7930  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: bad buffer id\n");
7931  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7932  }
7933 
7934  is_semi_planar = ((p_ctx->pixel_format == NI_PIX_FMT_NV12) ||
7935  p_ctx->pixel_format == NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE) ?
7936  1 :
7937  0;
7938 
7939  ni_get_hw_yuv420p_dim(p_ctx->active_video_width, p_ctx->active_video_height,
7940  p_ctx->bit_depth_factor, is_semi_planar, linestride,
7941  alignedheight);
7942 
7943  uexp.fd = -1;
7944  uexp.flags = 0;
7945  uexp.offset = offset;
7946 
7947  uexp.length = ni_calculate_total_frame_size(p_ctx, linestride);
7948  uexp.domain = p_ctx->domain;
7949  uexp.bus = p_ctx->bus;
7950  uexp.dev = p_ctx->dev;
7951  uexp.fn = p_ctx->fn;
7952  uexp.bar = 4; // PCI BAR4 configuration space
7953 
7954  ret = ioctl(p_ctx->netint_fd, NETINT_IOCTL_EXPORT_DMABUF, &uexp);
7955  if (ret < 0)
7956  {
7957  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: Failed to export dmabuf %d errno %d\n",
7958  __func__, ret, NI_ERRNO);
7959  return NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
7960  }
7961 
7962  *p_surface = hwdesc;
7963  p_surface->ui16width = p_ctx->active_video_width;
7964  p_surface->ui16height = p_ctx->active_video_height;
7965  p_surface->ui32nodeAddress = 0; // unused field
7966  p_surface->encoding_type = is_semi_planar ?
7967  NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_SEMIPLANAR :
7968  NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_PLANAR;
7969  p_surface->dma_buf_fd = uexp.fd;
7970 
7971  return retval;
7972 }
7973 
7974 /*!*****************************************************************************
7975  * \brief Lock a hardware P2P frame prior to encoding
7976  *
7977  * \param[in] p_upl_ctx pointer to caller allocated upload context
7978  * [in] p_frame pointer to caller allocated hardware P2P frame
7979  *
7980  * \return On success
7981  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
7982  * On failure NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
7983  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
7984 *******************************************************************************/
7985 ni_retcode_t ni_uploader_frame_buffer_lock(ni_session_context_t *p_upl_ctx,
7986  ni_frame_t *p_frame)
7987 {
7988  int ret;
7989  struct netint_iocmd_attach_rfence uatch = {0};
7990  struct pollfd pfds[1] = {0};
7991  niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface;
7992 
7993  if (p_upl_ctx == NULL || p_frame == NULL)
7994  {
7995  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: bad parameters\n", __func__);
7996  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7997  }
7998 
7999  if (p_frame->p_data[3] == NULL)
8000  {
8001  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: not a hardware frame\n", __func__);
8002  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8003  }
8004 
8005  p_surface = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_frame->p_data[3];
8006 
8007  pfds[0].fd = p_surface->dma_buf_fd;
8008  pfds[0].events = POLLIN;
8009  pfds[0].revents = 0;
8010 
8011  ret = poll(pfds, 1, -1);
8012  if (ret < 0)
8013  {
8014  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s:failed to poll dmabuf fd errno %d\n", __func__,
8015  NI_ERRNO);
8016  return ret;
8017  }
8018 
8019  uatch.fd = p_surface->dma_buf_fd;
8020  ret = ioctl(p_upl_ctx->netint_fd, NETINT_IOCTL_ATTACH_RFENCE, &uatch);
8021  if (ret < 0)
8022  {
8023  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
8024  "%s: failed to attach dmabuf read fence errno %d\n", __func__,
8025  NI_ERRNO);
8026  return ret;
8027  }
8028 
8029  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8030 }
8031 
8032 /*!*****************************************************************************
8033  * \brief Unlock a hardware P2P frame after encoding
8034  *
8035  * \param[in] p_upl_ctx pointer to caller allocated upload context
8036  * [in] p_frame pointer to caller allocated hardware P2P frame
8037  *
8038  * \return On success
8039  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
8040  * On failure NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
8041  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
8042 *******************************************************************************/
8043 ni_retcode_t ni_uploader_frame_buffer_unlock(ni_session_context_t *p_upl_ctx,
8044  ni_frame_t *p_frame)
8045 {
8046  int ret;
8047  struct netint_iocmd_signal_rfence usigl = {0};
8048  niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface;
8049 
8050  if ((p_upl_ctx == NULL) || (p_frame == NULL))
8051  {
8052  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: Invalid parameters %p %p\n", __func__,
8053  p_upl_ctx, p_frame);
8054  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8055  }
8056 
8057  p_surface = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_frame->p_data[3];
8058 
8059  if (p_surface == NULL)
8060  {
8061  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: Invalid hw frame\n", __func__);
8062  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8063  }
8064 
8065  usigl.fd = p_surface->dma_buf_fd;
8066  ret = ioctl(p_upl_ctx->netint_fd, NETINT_IOCTL_SIGNAL_RFENCE, &usigl);
8067  if (ret < 0)
8068  {
8069  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Failed to signal dmabuf read fence\n");
8070  return NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
8071  }
8072 
8073  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8074 }
8075 
8076 /*!*****************************************************************************
8077  * \brief Special P2P test API function. Copies YUV data from the software
8078  * frame to the hardware P2P frame on the Quadra device
8079  *
8080  * \param[in] p_upl_ctx pointer to caller allocated uploader session
8081  * context
8082  * [in] p_swframe pointer to a caller allocated software frame
8083  * [in] p_hwframe pointer to a caller allocated hardware frame
8084  *
8085  * \return On success
8086  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
8087  * On failure
8088  * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
8089  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
8090 *******************************************************************************/
8091 ni_retcode_t ni_uploader_p2p_test_send(ni_session_context_t *p_upl_ctx,
8092  uint8_t *p_data, uint32_t len,
8093  ni_frame_t *p_hwframe)
8094 {
8095  int ret;
8096  struct netint_iocmd_issue_request uis = {0};
8097  niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface;
8098 
8099  if (p_upl_ctx == NULL || p_data == NULL || p_hwframe == NULL)
8100  {
8101  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: invalid null parameters\n", __func__);
8102  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8103  }
8104 
8105  if (p_hwframe->p_data[3] == NULL)
8106  {
8107  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: empty frame\n", __func__);
8108  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8109  }
8110 
8111  p_surface = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_hwframe->p_data[3];
8112 
8113  uis.fd = p_surface->dma_buf_fd;
8114  uis.data = p_data;
8115  uis.len = len;
8116  uis.dir = NI_DMABUF_WRITE_TO_DEVICE;
8117 
8118  ret = ioctl(p_upl_ctx->netint_fd, NETINT_IOCTL_ISSUE_REQ, &uis);
8119  if (ret < 0)
8120  {
8121  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
8122  "%s: Failed to request dmabuf rendering errno %d\n", __func__,
8123  NI_ERRNO);
8124  return NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
8125  }
8126 
8127  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8128 }
8129 
8130 /*!*****************************************************************************
8131  * \brief Recycle hw P2P frames
8132  *
8133  * \param [in] p_frame pointer to an acquired P2P hw frame
8134  *
8135  * \return on success
8136  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
8137  *
8138  * on failure
8139  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
8140 *******************************************************************************/
8141 ni_retcode_t ni_hwframe_p2p_buffer_recycle(ni_frame_t *p_frame)
8142 {
8143  niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface;
8144  ni_retcode_t rc = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8145 
8146  if (p_frame == NULL)
8147  {
8148  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: Invalid frame\n", __func__);
8149  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8150  }
8151 
8152  p_surface = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_frame->p_data[3];
8153 
8154  if (p_surface == NULL)
8155  {
8156  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: Invalid surface data\n", __func__);
8157  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8158  }
8159 
8160  rc = ni_hwframe_buffer_recycle(p_surface, p_surface->device_handle);
8161  return rc;
8162 }
8163 
8164 ni_retcode_t ni_scaler_p2p_frame_acquire(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
8165  niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface,
8166  int data_len)
8167 {
8168  unsigned int offset;
8169  int ret;
8170 
8171  ret = ni_get_memory_offset(p_ctx, p_surface, &offset);
8172  if (ret != 0)
8173  {
8174  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: bad buffer id\n");
8175  return NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
8176  }
8177  p_surface->ui32nodeAddress = 0;
8178 
8179  struct netint_iocmd_export_dmabuf uexp;
8180  uexp.fd = -1;
8181  uexp.flags = 0;
8182  uexp.offset = offset;
8183  uexp.length = data_len;
8184  uexp.domain = p_ctx->domain;
8185  uexp.bus = p_ctx->bus;
8186  uexp.dev = p_ctx->dev;
8187  uexp.fn = p_ctx->fn;
8188  uexp.bar = 4;
8189  ret = ioctl(p_ctx->netint_fd, NETINT_IOCTL_EXPORT_DMABUF, &uexp);
8190  if (ret < 0)
8191  {
8192  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "failed to export dmabuf: %s\n", strerror(errno));
8193  return NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
8194  }
8195  p_surface->dma_buf_fd = uexp.fd;
8196  return ret;
8197 }
8198 #endif
8199 
8200 /*!*****************************************************************************
8201  * \brief Set the incoming frame format for the encoder
8202  *
8203  * \param[in] p_enc_ctx pointer to encoder context
8204  * [in] p_enc_params pointer to encoder parameters
8205  * [in] width input width
8206  * [in] height input height
8207  * [in] bit_depth 8 for 8-bit YUV, 10 for 10-bit YUV
8208  * [in] src_endian NI_FRAME_LITTLE_ENDIAN or NI_FRAME_BIG_ENDIAN
8209  * [in] planar 0 for semi-planar YUV, 1 for planar YUV
8210  *
8211  * \return on success
8212  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
8213  *
8214  * on failure
8215  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
8216  *
8217 *******************************************************************************/
8218 ni_retcode_t ni_encoder_set_input_frame_format(ni_session_context_t *p_enc_ctx,
8219  ni_xcoder_params_t *p_enc_params,
8220  int width, int height,
8221  int bit_depth, int src_endian,
8222  int planar)
8223 {
8224  int alignedw;
8225  int alignedh;
8226 
8227  if (p_enc_ctx == NULL || p_enc_params == NULL)
8228  {
8229  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: null ptr\n", __func__);
8230  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8231  }
8232 
8233  if (!(bit_depth == 8) && !(bit_depth == 10))
8234  {
8235  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: bad bit depth %d\n", __func__, bit_depth);
8236  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8237  }
8238 
8239  if (!(src_endian == NI_FRAME_LITTLE_ENDIAN) &&
8240  !(src_endian == NI_FRAME_BIG_ENDIAN))
8241  {
8242  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: bad endian %d\n", __func__, src_endian);
8243  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8244  }
8245 
8246  if ((planar < 0) || (planar >= NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_MAX))
8247  {
8248  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: bad planar value %d\n", __func__, planar);
8249  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8250  }
8251 
8252  p_enc_ctx->src_bit_depth = bit_depth;
8253  p_enc_ctx->bit_depth_factor = (bit_depth == 8) ? 1 : 2;
8254  p_enc_ctx->src_endian = src_endian;
8255 
8256  alignedw = width;
8257 
8258  if (alignedw < NI_MIN_WIDTH)
8259  {
8260  p_enc_params->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_right +=
8261  (NI_MIN_WIDTH - width) / 2 * 2;
8262  alignedw = NI_MIN_WIDTH;
8263  } else
8264  {
8265  alignedw = ((width + 1) / 2) * 2;
8266  p_enc_params->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_right +=
8267  (alignedw - width) / 2 * 2;
8268  }
8269 
8270  p_enc_params->source_width = alignedw;
8271  alignedh = height;
8272 
8273  if (alignedh < NI_MIN_HEIGHT)
8274  {
8275  p_enc_params->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_bottom +=
8276  (NI_MIN_HEIGHT - height) / 2 * 2;
8277  alignedh = NI_MIN_HEIGHT;
8278  } else
8279  {
8280  alignedh = ((height + 1) / 2) * 2;
8281  p_enc_params->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_bottom +=
8282  (alignedh - height) / 2 * 2;
8283  }
8284 
8285  p_enc_params->source_height = alignedh;
8286  p_enc_params->cfg_enc_params.planar = planar;
8287 
8288  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8289 }
8290 
8291 /*!*****************************************************************************
8292  * \brief Set the outgoing frame format for the uploader
8293  *
8294  * \param[in] p_upl_ctx pointer to uploader context
8295  * [in] width width
8296  * [in] height height
8297  * [in] pixel_format pixel format
8298  * [in] isP2P 0 = normal, 1 = P2P
8299  *
8300  * \return on success
8301  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
8302  *
8303  * on failure
8304  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
8305 *******************************************************************************/
8306 ni_retcode_t ni_uploader_set_frame_format(ni_session_context_t *p_upl_ctx,
8307  int width, int height,
8308  ni_pix_fmt_t pixel_format, int isP2P)
8309 {
8310  if (p_upl_ctx == NULL)
8311  {
8312  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: null ptr\n", __func__);
8313  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8314  }
8315 
8316  if (pixel_format == NI_PIX_FMT_NONE || pixel_format == NI_PIX_FMT_RGBA)
8317  {
8318  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: Invalid pixel format %d\n", __func__,
8319  pixel_format);
8320  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8321  }
8322 
8323  switch (pixel_format)
8324  {
8325  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
8326  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
8327  p_upl_ctx->src_bit_depth = 8;
8328  p_upl_ctx->bit_depth_factor = 1;
8329  break;
8330 
8331  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
8332  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
8333  p_upl_ctx->src_bit_depth = 10;
8334  p_upl_ctx->bit_depth_factor = 2;
8335  break;
8336 
8337  default:
8338  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: Invalid pixfmt %d\n", __func__,
8339  pixel_format);
8340  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8341  }
8342 
8343  p_upl_ctx->src_endian = NI_FRAME_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
8344  p_upl_ctx->pixel_format = pixel_format;
8345  p_upl_ctx->active_video_width = width;
8346  p_upl_ctx->active_video_height = height;
8347  p_upl_ctx->isP2P = isP2P;
8348 
8349  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8350 }
8351 
8352 /*!*****************************************************************************
8353  * \brief Read encoder stream header from the device
8354  *
8355  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated
8356  * ni_session_context_t struct from encoder
8357  * \param[in] p_data Pointer to a caller allocated ni_session_data_io_t
8358  * struct which contains a ni_packet_t data packet to
8359  * receive
8360  * \return On success
8361  * Total number of bytes read
8362  * On failure
8363  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
8364  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
8365  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
8366 *******************************************************************************/
8367 int ni_encoder_session_read_stream_header(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
8368  ni_session_data_io_t *p_data)
8369 {
8370  int rx_size;
8371  int done = 0;
8372  int bytes_read = 0;
8373 
8374  /* This function should be called once at the start of encoder read */
8375  if (p_ctx->pkt_num != 0)
8376  {
8377  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: stream header has already been read\n");
8378  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
8379  }
8380 
8381  while (!done)
8382  {
8383  rx_size = ni_device_session_read(p_ctx, p_data, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
8384 
8385  if (rx_size > (int)p_ctx->meta_size)
8386  {
8387  /* stream header has been read, return size */
8388  bytes_read += (rx_size - (int)p_ctx->meta_size);
8389 
8390  p_ctx->pkt_num = 1;
8391  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Got encoded stream header\n");
8392  done = 1;
8393  } else if (rx_size != 0)
8394  {
8395  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: received rx_size = %d\n", rx_size);
8396  bytes_read = -1;
8397  done = 1;
8398  } else
8399  {
8400  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "No data, keep reading..\n");
8401  continue;
8402  }
8403  }
8404 
8405  return bytes_read;
8406 }
8407 
8408 /*!*****************************************************************************
8409  * \brief Get the DMA buffer file descriptor from the P2P frame
8410  *
8411  * \param[in] p_frame pointer to a P2P frame
8412  *
8413  * \return On success
8414  * DMA buffer file descriptor
8415  * On failure
8416  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
8417 *******************************************************************************/
8418 int32_t ni_get_dma_buf_file_descriptor(const ni_frame_t* p_frame)
8419 {
8420  const niFrameSurface1_t *p_surface;
8421 
8422  if (p_frame == NULL)
8423  {
8424  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: NULL frame\n", __func__);
8425  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8426  }
8427 
8428  p_surface = (niFrameSurface1_t *)p_frame->p_data[3];
8429 
8430  if (p_surface == NULL)
8431  {
8432  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: Invalid hw frame\n", __func__);
8433  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8434  }
8435 
8436  return p_surface->dma_buf_fd;
8437 }
8438 
8439 /*!*****************************************************************************
8440  * \brief Send sequence change information to device
8441  *
8442  * \param[in] p_ctx Pointer to a caller allocated
8443  * ni_session_context_t struct
8444  * \param[in] width input width
8445  * \param[in] height input height
8446  * \param[in] bit_depth_factor 1 for 8-bit YUV, 2 for 10-bit YUV
8447  * \param[in] device_type device type (must be encoder)
8448  * \return On success
8449  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
8450  * On failure
8451  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
8452  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
8453  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
8454  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
8455  ******************************************************************************/
8456 ni_retcode_t ni_device_session_sequence_change(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
8457  int width, int height, int bit_depth_factor, ni_device_type_t device_type)
8458 {
8459  ni_resolution_t resolution;
8460  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8461 
8462  // requires API version >= 54
8463  if (p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] < (uint8_t)'5' ||
8464  (p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX] < (uint8_t)'4' &&
8465  p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] == (uint8_t)'5'))
8466  {
8467  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: %s function not supported in FW API version %c%c\n", __func__,
8468  (char)p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX],
8469  (char)p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX]);
8470  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
8471  }
8472 
8473  /* This function should be called only if sequence change is detected */
8474  if (p_ctx->session_run_state != SESSION_RUN_STATE_SEQ_CHANGE_DRAINING)
8475  {
8476  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error: stream header has already been read\n");
8477  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
8478  }
8479 
8480  resolution.width = width;
8481  resolution.height = height;
8482  resolution.bit_depth_factor = bit_depth_factor;
8483 
8484  switch (device_type)
8485  {
8486  case NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER:
8487  {
8488  // config sequence change
8489  retval = ni_encoder_session_sequence_change(p_ctx, &resolution);
8490  break;
8491  }
8492  default:
8493  {
8494  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8495  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: Config sequence change not supported for device type: %d", device_type);
8496  return retval;
8497  }
8498  }
8499  return retval;
8500 }
